verses.padam: - Padam viṣṇumuKA̍ iti viṣṇu# - muKAḥ|vai|dEvAḥ|CandOBiriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|imAn|lOkAn|anapajayyamityanapa̍ - jayyam|aBIti|ajayann|yat|viṣṇukramAniti̍# viṣṇu-kramAn|kramatE|viṣṇu̍ḥ|Eva|BUtvA|yaja̍mAnaḥ|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|imAn|lOkAn|anapajayyamityanapa-jayyam|aBIti̍|jayati|viṣṇO̱ḥ|krama̍ḥ|asi|aBimAtihEtya̍BimAti-hA|iti̍|Aha|gAyatrI|vai|pRuthivI|traiṣṭu̍Bam|antari̍kṣam|jAga̍tI|dyauḥ|Anu̍ṣṭuBIrityAnu̍# - stuBIḥ|diśaḥ|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|Eva|imAn|lOkAn|yathApUrvamiti# yathA - pUrvam|aBIti|jayati|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|agnim|asRujata|saḥ|asmAt|sRuṣṭaḥ|1 (50)
verses.samhita: viṣṇumuKA̍ vai dEvA śCandOBirimAn̍ ~MlOkAnanapajayya̍ maByajayanq.yad-vi̍ṣṇukramAn̍ kramatE̍ viṣṇurEva̍ BUtvA yajamAnaśCandO̍BirimAn̍ ~MlOkAnanapajayyamaBi̍ jayati̍ viṣṇOḥ kramO̱&sya-BimAtihEtyAha̍ gAyatrI vai pRuthivI̍ traiṣṭhuBamantari̍kṣaM̍ jAgatI̍ dyaurAnuṣṭuBIrdiśa̍ śCandOBirEvEmAn̍ ~MlOkAn. yathA̍ pUrvamaBi jayati̍ prajApatiragnima̍sRujata̍ sO̱&smAth sRuṣṭaḥ - [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam parA~g|ait|tam|EtayA̱|anviti̍|ait|akra̍ndat|iti̍|tayA̱|vai|saḥ|agnEḥ|priyam|dhAma̍|avEti̍|arundha|yat|EtAm|anvAhEtya̍nu-Aha̍|agnEḥ|Eva|EtayA̱|priyam|dhAma̍|avEti̍|rundhE|Iśvaraḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|parA~g̍|pradaGa̍ iti# pra -daGaḥ|yaḥ|viṣṇukramAniti̍# viṣṇu - kramAn|kramatE|catasRuBiriti̍# catasRu - Biḥ|Eti|vartatE|catvAri̍|CandAṃ̍si|CandAṃ̍si|Kalu̍|vai|agnEḥ|priyA|tanUḥ|priyAm|Eva|asya|tanuva̱m|aBIti̍|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: parA~gait̍ tamEtayA &nvaidakrandaditi̍ tayA vai sO̱&gnEḥ priyaM dhAmA&vArundha̍ yadEtAmanvAhA-gnErEvaitayA̱ priyaM dhAmA&va# rundha IśvarO vA Eṣa parA̱~g pradaGO yO viṣṇukramAn̍ kramatE̍ catasRuBirA vartatE̍ catvAri CandAṃsi̍ CandAṃsi̍ Kalu vA agnEḥ priyA tanUḥ priyAmEvAsya# tanuvamaBi̍ - [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam paryAvartata̍ iti# pari - AvartatE|dakṣiṇA|paryAva̍rtata̍ iti# pari - AvartatE|svam|Eva|vIrya̱m|anviti̍|paryAva̍rtata̍ iti# pari - AvartatE|tasmA̱t|dakṣi̍ṇaḥ|ad^^rdha̍ḥ|Atmana̍ḥ|vIryA̍vattara̍ iti# vIryAvat̍ - taraḥ|athO iti|Adityasya̍|Eva|AvRutamityA̱̍ - vRuta̱m|anviti|paryAva̍rtata̍ iti# pari - AvartatE|śunaśśEpa̱m|AjI̍gartim|varu̍ṇaḥ|agRuhṇAt|saḥ|EtAm|vAruṇIm|apaśyat|tayA̱|vai|saḥ|AtmAna̱m|varuṇapAśAditi̍# varuṇa - pAśAt|amu~jcat|varuṇaḥ|vai|Etam|gRuhṇAti|yaḥ|uKAm|pratimu~jcata̍ iti# prati - mu~jcatE̱|uditi|uttamamityu̍t̍ - tamam|varuṇa|pAśa̱m|asmat|iti|Aha|AtmAna̱m|Eva|EtayA̱|3̍ (50)
verses.samhita: paryAvartatE̍ dakṣiṇA paryAvartatE̍ svamEva vIryamanu̍# paryAvartatE̍ tasmAd-dakṣiṇO&rddha# AtmanO# vIryAvattarO&thO̍# AdityasyaivA&&*vRutamanu# paryAvartatE̍ śunaśśEpamAjIgartiM̍ ~MvaruṇO&gRuhṇAth̍ sa EtAM ~MvAruṇIma̍paśyat̍ tayA vai sa AtmAnaM̍ ~MvaruṇapAśAdamu~jcad-varu̍ṇO̍ vA EtaM gRuhṇAti̍ ya uKAM pratimu~jcata̍ uduttamaM̍ ~MvaruṇapAśa̍-masmadityA̍hA-&&*tmAna̍mEvaitayA̍# - [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam varuṇapAśAditi# varuṇa-pAśAt|mu~jcati|Eti|tvA|ahArq.ṣam|iti̍|Aha|Eti̍|hi|Enam|hara̍ti|dhruvaḥ|tiṣṭha|avi̍cAcalirityavi̍# - cAcaliḥ|iti|Aha|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|viśaḥ|tvA|sarvA̱ḥ|vA~jCantu|iti̍|Aha|viśA|Eva|Enam|samiti̍|ad^^rdhayati|asminn|rAṣṭram|adhIti̍|śraya|iti̍|Aha|rAṣṭram|Eva|asminn|dhruvam|akaḥ|yam|kAmayE̍ta|rAṣṭram|syAt|iti̍|tam|mana̍sA|dhyAyEt|rAṣṭram|Eva|Bavati|4̍ (50)
verses.samhita: varuṇapAśAn mu~jcatyA̍ tvA&*hAṛṣamityAhA̍ &&*hyanaṃq̍ harati̍ dhruvastiṣṭhA &vicAcalirityA̍ha̍ pratiṣṭhityai̍ viśastvA̍ sarvA# vA~jCantvityAha̍ viśaivainaṃq samarddhayatyasmin̍ rAṣṭramadhi# śrayEtyAha̍ rAṣṭramEvAsmin̍ dhruvamakaryaM̍ kAmayEta̍ rAṣṭraṅ syAditi taM manasA̍ dhyAyEd-rAṣṭramEva Bavatya̍ - [ ] 4

verses.padam: - Padam agrE̱|bRuhann|uṣasA̱m|Ud^^rdhvaḥ|asthAt|iti|Aha|agra̱m|Eva|Enam|samAnAnA̱m|karOti|nirjagmivAniti̍# niḥ-jagmivAn|tamasaḥ|iti̍|Aha|tama̍ḥ|Eva|asmAt|apEti̍|hanti|jyOti̍ṣA|Eti̍|agAt|iti̍|Aha|jyOti̍ḥ|Eva|asminn|dadhAti|catasRuBiriti̍# catasRu - Biḥ|sAdayati|catvAri|CandAṃ̍si|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|Eva|aticCandasEtyati̍# - CandasA|uttamayEtyut̍ - tamayA̱|varṣma|vai|EṣA|Canda̍sAm|yat|ati̍cCandA̍ ityati# - CandAḥ|varṣma|Eva|Enam|samAnAnA̱m|karOti|sadvatIti̍ sat - vatI|5 (50)
verses.samhita: -grE# bRuhannuṣasAmUrddhvO̍ asthAdityAhA&gra̍mEvainaṃ̍# samAnAnA̱M karOti nirjagmivAn tamasa̍ ityAha̍ tama# EvAsmAdapa# hanti jyOtiṣA- &&gAdityAha̍ jyOtirEvA-smi̍n̍ dadhAti catasRuBiḥ̍ sAdayati catvAri CandAṃsi̍ CandOBirEvA&-ti̍cCandasOttamayA̍ varṣma vA EṣA CandasAM̍ ~MyadaticCandA̍ varṣmaivainaṃ# samAnAnA̱M karOti sadvatI̍ - [ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam Bavati|sattvamiti# sat - tvam|Eva|Enam|gamayati|vAthsaprEṇEti# vAthsa - prEṇa|upEti̍|tiṣṭhatE|EtEna̍|vai|vathsaprIriti̍# vathsa - prIḥ|BAlandanaḥ|agnEḥ|priyam|dhAma|avEti̍|arundha|agnEḥ|Eva|EtEna̍|priyam|dhAma̍|avEti̍|rundhE|EkAdaśam|Bavati|EkadhEtyE̍ka̍ - dhA|Eva|yajamAnE|vIrya̱m|dadhAti|stOmE̍na|vai|dEvAḥ|asminn|lOkE|Ad^^rdhnuvann|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|amuṣminn|stOma̍sya|iva|Kalu̍|vai|Etat|rUpam|yat|vAthsapramiti̍# vAthsa-pram|yat|vAthsaprEṇEti# vAthsa-prEṇa|upatiṣṭha̍ta̍ ityupa-tiṣṭha̍tE|6̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Bavati sattvamEvainaM̍ gamayati vAthsaprEṇOpa# tiṣṭhata EtEna vai vathsaprIrBA̍landanO̱&gnEḥ̍ priyaM dhAmA&vA&rundhA&gnErEvaitEna̍# priyaM dhAmA&va# rundha EkAdaśaM BavatyEkadhaiva̍ yajamAnE̍ vIryaM̍ dadhAti stOmEna̍ vai dEvA asmin ~MlOka A̱rddhnuvan CandOBiramuṣminth̍ stOmasyEva̍ Kalu vA Etad-rUpaM ~Myad-vA̱thsapraM ~Myad-vA̱thsaprEṇOpatiṣṭha̍ta̍ - [ ] 6

verses.padam: - Padam imam|Eva|tEna|lOkam|aBIti̍|jayati|yat|viṣṇukramAniti̍# viṣṇu - kramAn|kramatE|amum|Eva|taiḥ|lOkam|aBIti̍|jayati|pUrvEdyuḥ|prEti̍|krAmati|uttarEdyuḥ|upEti̍|tiṣṭhatE|tasmA̱t|yOgE̱|anyAsA̱m|prajAnAmiti̍# pra - jAnA̱m|manaḥ|kṣEmE̱|anyAsA̱m|tasmA̱t|yAyAvaraḥ|kṣEmyasya̍|IśE|tasmA̱t|yAyAvaraḥ|kṣEmyam|addhyava̍syatItya̍dhi̍ - avasyati|muṣṭI̍ iti|karOti|vAca̱m|yacCati|yajñasya̍|dhRutyai̱||7̍ (42) (sRuṣṭO̱& - (1q) ByE# - tayA# - Bavati - sadvatyu̍ - patiṣṭhatE̍ - dvicatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A1)
verses.samhita: imamEva tEna# lOkamaBi jayati̍ yad-viṣṇukramAn̍ kramatE&mumEva̍ tairlOkamaBi jayati̍ pUrvEdyuḥ prakrAmatyuttarEdyurupa̍# tiṣṭhatE tasmAd-yOgE&nyAsA̱M prajAnAM manaḥ kṣEmE&nyAsAM tasmA̱d-yAyAvaraḥ kṣEmyasyEśE̍ tasmA̱d-yAyAvaraḥ kṣEmyamaddhyavasyati̍ muṣṭI karOti̍ vAcaM̍ ~MyacCati yajñasya dhRutyai̱||7 (sRuṣṭO̱& - (1q) ByE# - tayA# - Bavati - sadvatyu̍ - patiṣṭhatE̍ - dvicatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam annapata̍ ityanna# - patE|annasya|naḥ|dEhi|iti̍|Aha|agniḥ|vai|anna̍patirityanna̍# - patiḥ|saḥ|Eva|asmai|anna̱m|prEti|yacCati|anamIvasya̍|śuṣmiṇa̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|ayakṣmasya̍|iti̍|vAva|Etat|Aha|prEti̍|pradAtAramiti̍# pra - dAtAra̱m|tAriṣaḥ|Urja̱m|naḥ|dhEhi|dvipada iti# dvi - padE̱|catuṣpada̍ iti catuḥ̍ - padE|iti|Aha|AśiṣamityA̱̍ - śiṣa̱m|Eva|EtAm|Eti|śAstE|uditi̍|u|tvA|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|iti̍|Aha|prAṇA̍ iti# pra-anAḥ|vai|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|8 (50)
verses.samhita: annapatE&nna̍sya̍ nO dEhItyAhA-gnirvA̍ annapatiḥ̍ sa EvAsmA annaM prayacCatyanamIvasya̍# śuṣmiṇa ityAhA-yakṣmasyEti̍ vAvaitadAha̍ pra pradAtAra̍M̍ tAriṣa UrjaM̍ nO dhEhi dvipadE catuṣpada̍ ityAhA&&*śiṣa̍mEvaitAmA̍ śA̱sta udu# tvA viśvE# dEvA ityAha̍ prAṇA vai viśvE# dEvAḥ - [ ] 8

verses.padam: - Padam prAṇairiti# pra - anaiḥ|Eva|Enam|uditi|yacCatE|agnE̱|Bara̍ntu|citti̍Biriti̍ citti# - Biḥ|iti|Aha|yasmai̱|Eva|Enam|cittAya̍|udyacCa̍ta̍ ityut̍ - yacCatE|tEna̍|Eva|Enam|samiti̍|ad^^rdhayati|catasRuBiriti̍# catasRu - Biḥ|Eti|sAdayati|catvAri̍|CandAṃ̍si|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|Eva|aticCandasEtyati̍# - CandasA|uttamayEtyut̍ - tamayA̱|varṣma|vai|EṣA|Canda̍sAm|yat|ati̍cCandA̍ ityati# - CandAḥ|varṣma|Eva|Enam|samAnAnA̱m|karOti|sadvatIti̍ sat - vatI|Bavati|sattvamiti# sat-tvam|Eva|Enam|gamayati|prEti|it|agnE|jyOti̍ṣmAn|9̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prAṇairEvainamudyacCatE̍ &gnE Barantu̍ cittiBirityA̍ha̍ yasmA# EvainaM̍ cittAyOdyacCatE̍ tEnaivainaṃq samarddhayati̍ catasRuBirA sAdayati̍ catvAri CandAṃsi̍ CandOBirEvA-ti̍cCandasOttamayA̍ varṣma vA EṣA CandasAM̍ ~MyadaticCandA̍ varṣmaivainaṃ# samAnAnA̱M karOti sadvatI̍ Bavati sattvamEvainaM̍ gamayati prEdagnE̍ jyOtiṣmAn̍ - [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam yAhi|iti|Aha|jyOti̍ḥ|Eva|asminn|dadhAti|tanuvA̱|vai|Eṣaḥ|hinasti|yam|hinasti̍|mA|hiṃqsIḥ|tanuvA̱|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|iti|Aha|prajABya̍ iti# pra - jAByaḥ|Eva|Enam|śamayati|rakṣAṃ̍si|vai|Etat|yajñam|sacantE|yat|ana̍ḥ|uthsarjatItyu̍t-sarja̍ti|akra̍ndat|iti̍|anviti̍|Aha|rakṣa̍sAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa# - hatyai|anasA|vahanti|apa̍citimityapa̍# - citim|Eva|asminn|dadhAti|tasmA̱t|anasvI|ca|rathI|ca|atithInAm|apa̍citatamAvityapa̍cita̍ - tamau|10 (50)
verses.samhita: yAhItyAha̍ jyOtirEvAsmi̍n̍ dadhAti tanuvA vA Eṣa hinasti̍ yaṃ hinasti mA hiṃsIstanuvA̱̍ prajA ityAha̍ prajABya# Evainaṃ# śamayati rakṣAṃsi̍ vA Etad-yajñaṃ sacantE̍ yadana# uthsarja-tyakrandadityanvA̍ha̍ rakṣasAmapa̍hatyA̍ anasA̍ vahan-tyapaciti-mEvAsmi̍n̍ dadhAti tasmAdanasvI̍ ca# rathI cAtithInA-mapa̍citatamA̍ - [ ] 10

verses.padam: - Padam apacitimAnityapa̍citi̍ - mAn|Bavati|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|samidhEti̍# saM - idhA̱|agnim|duvasyata|iti|GRutAnuṣiktAmiti̍# GRuta - anuṣiktAm|avasita̍ ityava# - sitE|samidhamiti# saM - idha̱m|Eti|dadhAti|yathA̱|ati̍thayE|Aga̍tAyEtyA̍ - gatAya|sarpiṣvat|Atithyam|kriyatE̱|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|gAyatriyA|brAhmaṇasya̍|gAyatraḥ|hi|brAhmaṇaḥ|triṣṭuBA̱|rAjanya̍sya|traiṣṭu̍Baḥ|hi|rAjanya̍ḥ|aPsvitya̍p-su|Basma̍|prEti̍|vEśayati|aPsuyO̍niritiyaPsu̍ - yOniḥ|vai|agniḥ|svAm|Eva|Enam|yOni̱m|gamayati|tisRuBiriti# tisRu-Biḥ|prEti|vEśayati|trivRuditi̍# tri - vRut|vai|11 (50)
verses.samhita: vapacitimAn̍ Bavati ya EvaM ~MvEda# samidhA&gniM duvasyatEti̍# GRutAnuṣiktAmavasitE̍ samidhamA dadhAti̍ yathA&tithaya̍ AgatAya̍ sarpiṣvadAtithyaM̍ kriyatE# tAdRugEva tad-gAyatriyA̍ brA̱hmaṇasya# gAyatrO hi brA̱hmaṇastriṣṭuBA# rAjanyasya̍ traiṣṭuBO̍ hi rAjanyO̱̍ &Psu Basma pra vEśayatyaPsuyO̍nirvA̍ agniḥ svAmEvainaM ~MyOniM̍ gamayati tisRuBiḥ pravEśayati̍ trivRudvA - [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam agniḥ|yAvAn|Eva|agniḥ|tam|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati - sthAm|gamayati|parEti|vai|Eṣaḥ|agnim|vapati|yaḥ|aPsvitya̍p̍ - su|Basma|pravEśayatIti̍# pra - vEśayati|jyOti̍ṣmatIByAm|avEti̍|dadhAti|jyOti̍ḥ|Eva|asminn|dadhAti|dvAByA̱m|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|parEti|vai|Eṣaḥ|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|paśUn|vapati|yaḥ|aPsvityap̍ - su|Basma|pravEśayatIti̍# pra - vEśayati|puna̍ḥ|UrjA|saha|rayyA|iti̍|puna̍ḥ|udaitItyu̍t̍ - aiti|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|Eva|paśUn|Atmann|dhattE|punaḥ|tvA|AdityAḥ|12̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agni-ryAvAnEvA&gnistaM̍ pratiṣṭhAM̍ gamayati̍ parA vA EṣO̱&gniM ~Mvapati̍ yO̱&Psu Basma# pravEśayati̍ jyOtiṣmatIByA-mava̍# dadhAti jyOtirEvA&smi̍n̍ dadhAti dvAByAM pratiṣṭhityai̍ parA vA Eṣa prajAM paśUn vapati̍ yO̱&Psu Basma# pravEśayati̍ punarUrjA̍ saha rayyEti punarudaiti̍# prajAmEva paśUnAtman dhattE̍ punastvA&&dityA̍ - [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam rudrAḥ|vasavaḥ|samiti̍|indhatAm|iti̍|Aha|EtAḥ|vai|Etam|dEvatA̱ḥ|agrE̱|samiti̍|aindhata|tABi̍ḥ|Eva|Enam|samiti̍|indhE|bOdha̍|saḥ|bOdhi|iti̍|upEti̍|tiṣṭhatE|bOdhaya̍ti|Eva|Enam|tasmA̱t|suptvA|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|prEti|buddhyantE|yathAsthAnamiti̍# yathA - sthAnam|upEti|tiṣṭhatE|tasmA̱t|yathAsthAnamiti̍# yathA - sthAnam|paśavaḥ|puna̍ḥ|EtyEtyA̱̍ - itya|upEti̍|tiṣṭhantE||13̍ (42) (vai viśvE# dEvA - jyOtiṣmA̍ - napacitatamau̍ - trivRudvA - AdityA̍ - dvicatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: rudrA vasavaḥ̍ samindhatA-mityA̍haitA̍ vA EtaM dEvatA agrE samai̱ndhata tABirEvainaṃq̍ samindhE̍ bOdhA sa bOdhItyupa# tiṣṭhatE bOdhayatyEvainaM̍ tasmA̱th suptvA prajAḥ prabuddhyantE̍ yathAsthAnamupa# tiṣṭhatE tasmA̱d-yathAsthAnaM paśavaḥ punarEtyOpa# tiṣṭhantE||13 (vai viśvE# dEvA - jyOtiṣmA̍ - napacitatamau̍ - trivRudvA - AdityA̍ - dvicatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam yAvatI|vai|pRuthivI|tasyai̱|yamaḥ|Adhi̍patyamityAdhi̍# - patyam|parIti|iyAya|yaḥ|vai|yamam|dEvayaja̍namiti̍# dEva - yajanam|asyAḥ|ani̍ryAcyEtyani̍ḥ̍ - yAcya|agnim|cinutE|yamAya|Enam|saḥ|cinutE|apEti̍|ita|iti̍|addhyava̍sAyayatItya̍dhi̍ - avasAyayati|yamam|Eva|dEvayaja̍namiti̍# dEva-yajanam|asyai|niryAcyEti̍# niḥ - yAcya|AtmanE̱|agnim|cinutE|iṣvagrEṇEtI̍ṣu̍ - agrEṇa|vai|asyAḥ|anA̍mRutamityanA̱̍ - mRutam|icCantaḥ|na|avindann|tE|dEvAḥ|Etat|yaju̍ḥ|apaśyann|apEti̍|ita|iti̍|yat|EtEna̍|addhyavasAyayatItya̍dhi̍ - avasAyayati|14̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yAvatI̍ vai pRuthivI̍ tasyai# yama AdhipatyaM̍ parIyAya̍ yO vai yamaM dEvayaja̍namasyA̍ aniryAcyA&gniM̍ cinutE̍ yamAyainaṃq̍ sa cinutE&pEtE-tyaddhyava̍sAyayati̍ yamamEva dEvayaja̍namasyai̍ niryAcyA- &&tmanE&gniM cinuta̍ iṣvagrEṇa vA asyA anAmRuta-micCantO̍ nAvindan̍ tE dEvA Etad-yajurapaśyannapEtEti̍ yadEtEnA̱-dhyavasAyayatya - [ ] 14

verses.padam: - Padam anAmRuta̍ ityanA̱ - mRutE|Eva|agnim|cinutE|uditi|hanti|yat|Eva|asyAḥ|amEddhyam|tat|apEti̍|hanti|apaḥ|avEti̍|ukṣati|śAntyai̱|sika̍tAḥ|nIti̍|vapati|Etat|vai|agnEḥ|vaiśvAnarasya̍|rUpam|rUpEṇa̍|Eva|vaiśvAnaram|avEti̍|rundhE|UṣAn̍|nIti̍|vapati|puṣṭi̍ḥ|vai|EṣA|prajana̍namiti̍# pra - jananam|yat|UṣA̱ḥ|puṣṭyA̱m|Eva|prajana̍na̍ iti# pra - jananE|agnim|cinutE|athO̍ iti|sajñAMna̍ iti# saM - jñAnE̱|Eva|sajñAMnamiti# saM-jñAna̱m|hi|Etat|15 (50)
verses.samhita: -nAmRuta̍ EvAgniM cinuta̍ uddhanti̍ yadEvAsyA# amEddhyaM tadapa# hantyapO&vO̱kṣati śAntyai sikatA̍ ni vapatyEtadvA̍ agnErvai̱śvAnarasya# rUpaṃ rUpEṇaiva vai̱śvAnaramava# rundha UṣAn nivapati̍ puṣṭirvA EṣA prajananaM̍ ~MyadUṣAḥ puṣṭyAmEva̍ prajananE&gniM̍ cinutE&thO̍# sajñAMna# Eva sajñAMnaṅq hyEtat̍ - [ ] 15

verses.padam: - Padam paśUnAm|yat|UṣA̱ḥ|dyAvApRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|saha|AstAm|tE iti|viyatI̍ iti# vi - yatI|abrUtAm|astu|Eva|nau|saha|yajñiya̱m|iti̍|yat|amuṣyA̱ḥ|yajñiya̱m|AsI̱t|tat|asyAm|adadhAt|tE|UṣA̱ḥ|aBavann|yat|asyAḥ|yajñiya̱m|AsI̱t|tat|amuṣyA̱m|adadhAt|tat|adaḥ|candrama̍si|kRuṣṇam|UṣAn̍|nivapanniti̍# ni-vapann|adaḥ|dhyAyEt|dyAvA̍pRuthivyOriti̍ dyAvA̱ - pRuthivyOḥ|Eva|yajñiyE̱|agnim|cinutE|ayam|saḥ|agniḥ|iti|viśvAmi̍trasyEti̍# viśva - mitrasya|16 (50)
verses.samhita: paśUnAM̍ ~MyadUṣA dyAvApRuthivI̍ sahA&&stAM tE viyatI̍ abrUtAmastvEva̍ nau# saha yajñiyamiti yadamuṣyA# yajñiyamAsIt tadasyAmadadhAt̍ ta UṣA# aBavanq yadasyA yajñiyamAsIt tadamuṣyAmadadhAt̍ tadadaścandramasi̍ kRuṣṇamUṣA̱n nivapannadO̍ dhyAyEd̍ dyAvApRuthivyOrEva̍ yajñiyE&gniM cinutE̍ &yaṃ sO agniriti# viśvAmitrasya̍ - [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam sUktamiti# su - uktam|Bavati|EtEna|vai|viśvAmi̍tra̍ iti# viśva - mitraḥ|agnEḥ|priyam|dhAma|avEti̍|arundha|agnEḥ|Eva|EtEna̍|priyam|dhAma̍|avEti̍|rundhE|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|vai|dEvAḥ|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Ayann|catasraḥ|prAcI̱ḥ|upEti̍|dadhAti|catvAri̍|CandAṃ̍si|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|Eva|tat|yajamAnaḥ|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Eti|tEṣA̱m|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|yatAm|diśaḥ|samiti̍|avlIyanta|tE|dvE̍ iti|purastA̱t|samIcI̍ iti|upEti̍|adadhata|dvE̍ iti|17̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sUktaM BavatyEtEna̍ vai viśvAmitrO&gnEḥ̍ priyaM dhAmA &vArundhAgnErEvaitEna̍# priyaM dhAmAva# rundhE CandOBirvai̍ dEvAḥ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyan̍ catasraḥ̍ prAcIrupa# dadhAti catvAri CandAṃsi̍ CandOBirEva̍ tad-yajamAnaḥ̍ suvargaM ~MlOkamEti̍ tEṣAṃ# suvargaM ~MlOkaM ~MyatAM diśaḥ samavlIyanta̍ tE dvE purastA̱th samIcI upAdadhata̍ dvE - [ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam paścAt|samIcI iti|tABi̍ḥ|vai|tE|diśa̍ḥ|adRuṃqhann|yat|dvE̍ iti|purastA̱t|samIcI̍ iti|upadadhAtItyu̍pa̍ - dadhAti|dvE̍ iti|paścAt|samIcI̍ iti|diśAm|vidhRu̍tyA̍ iti vi-dhRutyai|athO iti|paśava̍ḥ|vai|CandAṃ̍si|paśUn|Eva|asmai|samIca̍ḥ|dadhAti|aṣṭau|upEti̍|dadhAti|aṣṭAkṣarEtyaṣṭA-akṣarA|gAyatrI|gAyatraḥ|agniḥ|yAvAn̍|Eva|agniḥ|tam|cinutE|aṣṭau|upEti̍|dadhAti|aṣṭAkṣarEtyaṣṭA-akṣarA|gAyatrI|gAyatrI|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|a~jjasA|vEda|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: paścAth samIcI tABirvai tEdiśO&dRuṃhanq̍ yaddvE purastA̱th samIcI# upadadhAti̍ dvE paqścAth samIcI# diśAM ~MvidhRutyA̍ athO# paśavO vai CandAṃsi̍ paśUnEvAsmai# samIcO# dadhAtyaṣṭAvupa# dadhAtyaṣṭAkṣarA̍ gAyatrI gAyatrO̱&gni-ryAvA̍nEvAgnistaM̍ cinutE&ṣṭAvupa̍# dadhAtyaṣṭAkṣarA̍ gAyatrI gAyatrI̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkama~jjasA̍ vEda suvargasya# lOkasya - [ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam prajñA̱tyA iti pra - jñAtyai|trayOdaśEti̍ trayaḥ̍ - daśa|lOkapRuMqṇA iti# lOkaM - pRuṇAḥ|upEti|dadhAti|Eka̍viṃśatirityEka̍# - viṃqśatiḥ|samiti|padyantE|pratiṣṭhEti̍# prati - sthA|vai|Ekaviṃqśa ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|pratiṣṭhEti# prati - sthA|gAṛhapatya̍ iti gAṛha# - patyaḥ|EkaviṃqśasyEtyEka̍ - viṃqśasya|Eva|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati-sthAm|gAṛhapatyamiti̍ gAṛha# - patyam|anu|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|pratIti̍|agnim|cikyAnaḥ|tiṣṭhati|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|pa~jca̍citIkamiti̍ pa~jca-citIkam|cinvIta|prathamam|cinvAnaḥ|pA~gkta̍ḥ|yajñaḥ|pA~gktA̱ḥ|paśava̍ḥ|yajñam|Eva|paśUn|avEti̍|rundhE|trici̍tIkamiti̍ tri - citIkam|cinvIta|dvitIya̱m|cinvAnaḥ|trayaḥ|imE|lOkAḥ|Eṣu|Eva|lOkEṣu̍|19̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prajñA̱tyai trayOdaśa̍ lOkaMpRuṇA upa# dadhAtyEkaviṃśatiḥ̍ saMpadyantE̍ pratiṣṭhA vA Ekaviṃqśaḥ̍ pratiṣṭhA̍ gAṛhapatya̍ Ekaviṃqśasyaiva pratiṣṭhAM̍ gAṛhapatyamanu̍ prati# tiṣṭhati pratyagniM cikyAnasti̍ṣṭhati̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda pa~jcacitIkaM̍ cinvIta prathamaM cinvAnaḥ̍ pA~gktO# yajñaḥ pA~gktA̱ḥ paśavO# yajñamEva paśUnava# rundhE tricitIkaM̍ cinvIta dvitIyaM̍ cinvAnastraya# imE lOkA EṣvEva̍ lOkEṣu - [ ] 19

verses.padam: - Padam pratIti|tiṣṭhati|Eka̍citIkamityEka̍# - citIkam|cinvIta|tRutIya̱m|cinvAnaḥ|EkadhEtyEka̍ - dhA|vai|suvarga iti# suvaḥ - gaḥ|lOkaḥ|EkavRutEtyEka̍ - vRutA̱|Eva|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Eti|purIṣEṇa|aBIti̍|Uhati|tasmA̱t|mAṃqsEna̍|asthi̍|Cannam|na|duścarmEti̍# duḥ - carmA̱|Bavati|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|pa~jca̍|cita̍yaḥ|Bavanti|pa~jcaBiriti̍# pa~jca - Biḥ|purIṣaiḥ|aBIti̍|Uhati|daśa̍|samiti̍|padyantE|daśA̱kṣarEti̍ daśa# - akṣarA|virAḍiti# vi-rAṭ|anna̱m|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjIti# vi - rAji|Eva|annAdya̍ ityanna̍ - adyE̱|pratIti|tiṣṭhati||20̍ (47) (adhyavasAyayati̍ - hyEta̍ - dviśvAmitrasyA̍ - dadhata dvE - lOkasya# - lOkEṣu# -saptacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: pratitiṣṭha-tyEka̍citIkaM̍ cinvIta tRutIyaM̍ cinvAna EkadhA̍ vai suvargO̍ lOka EkavRutaiva̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamEti̍ purIṣEṇAByU̍hati̍ tasmA̱nmAṃq sEnAsthi# CannaM na duścarmA# Bavati ya EvaM ~MvEda pa~jca citayO̍ Bavanti pa~jcaBiḥ purIṣairaByU̍hati̍ daśa saMpadyantE̍ daśA̱kṣarA virAḍannaM̍ ~MvirAḍ virAjyEvA&nnAdyE pratitiṣṭhati||20̍ (adhyavasAyayati̍ - hyEta̍ - dviśvAmitrasyA̍ - dadhata dvE - lOkasya# - lOkEṣu# -saptacatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam vIti|vai|Etau|dviṣAtE̍ iti|yaḥ|ca|purA|agniḥ|yaḥ|ca|uKAyA̱m|samiti̍|itam|iti̍|catasRuBiriti̍# catasRu-Biḥ|sam|nIti|vapati|catvAri̍|CandAṃ̍si|CandAṃ̍si|Kalu̍|vai|agnEḥ|priyA|tanUḥ|priyayA̱|Eva|Enau|tanuvA̱|samiti̍|śAsti|samiti̍|itam|iti̍|Aha|tasmA̱t|brahma̍ṇA|kṣatram|samiti̍|Eti|yat|sanyuMpyEti̍# saM - nyupya|viharatIti̍# vi - harati|tasmA̱t|brahma̍ṇA|kṣatram|vIti̍|Eti|RutuBirityRutu̍ - Biḥ|21 (50)
verses.samhita: vi vA Etau dviṣAtE̍ yaśca# purA&gniryaścOKAyAṃq samitamiti̍# catasRuBiḥ saM nivapati̍ catvAri CandAṃsi̍ CandAṃsi̍ Kalu vA agnEḥ priyA tanUḥ priyayaivainau# tanuvA saṃ śA̱sti samitamityA̍ha̍ tasmAdbrahmaṇA̍ kṣatraṃ samEti̍ yathsaM nyupya# viharati̍ tasmAd brahmaṇA̍ kṣatraM ~MvyE̱tyRutuBi - [ ] 21

verses.padam: - Padam vai|Etam|dIkṣayanti|saḥ|RutuBirityRutu - Biḥ|Eva|vimucya iti# vi - mucyaḥ|mAtA|iva|putram|pRuthivI|purIṣya̱m|iti̍|Aha|RutuBirityRutu̍ - Biḥ|Eva|Enam|dIkṣayitvA|RutuBirityRutu-Biḥ|vIti|mu~jcati|vaiśvAnaryA|śikya̱m|Eti̍|dattE|svadaya̍ti|Eva|Enatq|nairq.RutIriti̍# naiḥ-RutIḥ|kRuṣṇAḥ|tisraḥ|tuṣapakvA̍ iti tuṣa# - pakvAḥ|Bavanti|niṛRutyA̍ iti niḥ - Rutyai|vai|Etat|BAgadhEyamiti# BAga - dhEya̱m|yat|tuṣA̱ḥ|niṛRutyA̍ iti niḥ-Rutyai|rUpam|kRuṣṇam|rUpEṇa|Eva|niṛRu̍timiti̍ niḥ - Rutim|niravadayata̍ iti# niḥ - avadayatE|imAm|diśa̱m|yanti|EṣA|22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -rvA EtaM dI̱kṣayanti sa RutuBirEva̍ vimucyO# mAtEva# putraM pRuthivI̍ purIṣya̍mityA̍ha-rtuBi̍rEvaina̍M̍ dIkṣayitvartuBirvi mu~jcati̍ vaiśvAnaryA śikyamA̍ dattE̍ svadayatyEvaina̍-nnaiṛRutIḥ̍ kRuṣṇA-stisra-stuṣapakvA̍ Bavanti niṛRutyai̍ vA Etad-BAgadhEyaM̍ ~Myat tuṣA niṛRutyai̍ rUpaM kRuṣṇaṃ rUpEṇaiva niṛRutiM̍ niravadayata̍ imAM diśaM̍ ~MyantyEṣA - [ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam vai|niṛRutyA̍ iti niḥ - Rutyai|dik|svAyA̱m|Eva|diśi|niṛRutimiti̍ niḥ - Rutim|niravadayata̍ iti# niḥ - avadayatE|svakRu̍ta̍ iti sva - kRutE|iriṇE|upEti̍|dadhAti|pradara̍ iti# pra - darE|vA|Etat|vai|niṛRutyA̍ iti niḥ - RutyAḥ|AyatanamityA̱̍ - yatanam|svE|Eva|Ayata̍na̍ ityA̱ - yatanE|niṛRu̍timiti̍ niḥ - Rutim|niravadayata̍ iti# niḥ - avadayatE|śikya̱m|aBi|upEti̍|dadhAti|nairq.Ruta̍ iti# naiḥ - Rutaḥ|vai|pAśaḥ|sAkṣAditi̍# sa - akṣAt|Eva|Enam|nirq.RutipAśAditi# niṛRuti - pAśAt|mu~jcati|tisraḥ|upEti|dadhAti|trEdhAvihita̍ iti# trEdhA - vihitaḥ|vai|puruṣaḥ|yAvAn̍|Eva|puru̍ṣaḥ|tasmA̱t|niṛRu̍timiti̍ niḥ - Rutim|avEti|yajatE|parA̍cIḥ|upEti̍|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vai niṛRutyai̍ dik svAyAmEva̍ diśi niṛRutiM̍ niravadayatE̍ svakRuta̍ iriṇa̍ upa# dadhAti pradarE vaitadvai niṛRutyA̍ Ayatanaṅq̍ sva EvA&&*yatanE̍ niṛRutiM̍ niravadayatE̍ śikyamaByupa̍# dadhAti naiṛRutO vai pAśaḥ̍ sAkṣAdEvainaM̍ niṛRutipAśAn-mu~jcati̍ tisra upa# dadhAti trEdhAvihitO vai puruṣO̍ yAvAnEva̍ puruṣastasmAn-niṛRu̍timava̍# yajatE parAcIrupa̍# - [ ] 23

verses.padam: - Padam dadhAti|parAcIm|Eva|asmAt|niṛRu̍timiti̍ niḥ - Rutim|prEti|nudatE|apra̍tIkṣamityapra̍ti̍ - Ikṣam|Eti|yanti|niṛRu̍tyA̍ iti niḥ - RutyAḥ|antaṛhityA̍ ityantaḥ - hityai|mArjayitvA|upEti|tiṣṭhantE|mEddhyatvAyEti̍# mEddhya - tvAya|gAṛha̍patyamiti̍ gAṛha# - patyam|upEti|tiṣṭhantE|nirq.RutilOka̍ iti# niṛRuti - lOkE|Eva|caritvA|pUtAḥ|dEvalOkamiti# dEva - lOkam|upAvartanta̍ ityupa̍ - AvartantE|Eka̍yA|upEti̍|tiṣṭhantE|EkadhEtyE̍ka̍ - dhA|Eva|yajamAnE|vIrya̱m|dadhati|nivEśa̍na̍ iti# ni-vEśanaḥ|sa~ggama̍na̍ iti# saM- gamanaḥ|vasU̍nAm|iti̍|Aha|prajEti̍# pra - jA|vai|paśavaḥ|vasu̍|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|Eva|Enam|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|samiti|ad^^rdhayanti||24̍ (48) (RutuBi# - rEṣA- parAcIrupA̍ - ṣṭAcatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A4)
verses.samhita: dadhAti parAcImEvAsmAn-niṛRu̍tiM̍ praṇudatE̍ &pratIkṣamA̍ yanti̍ niṛRutyA̍ antaṛhityai̍ mArjayitvOpa# tiṣṭhantE mEddhyatvAya gAṛhapatyamupa̍# tiṣṭhantE niṛRuti lOka Eva caritvA̍ pUtA dEvalOkamupAva̍rtanta̍ EkayOpa# tiṣṭhanta Ekadhaiva yajamAnE̍ vIryaM̍ dadhati nivEśanaḥ̍ sa~ggamanO̍ vasUnAmityA̍ha̍ prajA vai paśavO vasu# prajayaivainaM̍ paśuBiḥ samarddhayanti||24̍ (RutuBi# - rEṣA- parAcIrupA̍ - ṣṭAcatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam puruṣamAtrEṇEti# puruṣa - mAtrEṇa|vIti̍|mimItE|yajñEna̍|vai|puru̍ṣaḥ|sammi̍ta̍ iti saM - mitaḥ|yajñaparuṣEti# yajña-paruṣA̱|Eva|Enam|vIti|mimItE|yAvAn̍|puru̍ṣaḥ|Ud^^rdhvabA̍hurityud^^rdhva-bAhuḥ|tAvAn̍|Bavati|EtAva̍t|vai|puru̍ṣE|vIrya̱m|vIryE̍ṇa|Eva|Enam|vIti̍|mimItE|pakṣI|Bavati|na|hi|apakṣaḥ|pati̍tum|aṛha̍ti|aratninA̱|pakṣau|drAGI̍yAṃsau|Bavataḥ|tasmA̱t|pakṣapra̍vayAṃqsIti̍# pakṣa - pravayAṃqsi|vayAṃsi|vyAmamAtrAviti̍# vyAma - mAtrau|pakṣau|ca|pucCa̱m|ca|Bavati|EtAvat|vai|puru̍ṣE|vIrya̱m|25̍ (50)
verses.samhita: puruṣamAtrEṇa vi mimItE̍ yajñEna vai puruṣaḥ̍ saMmitO̍ yajñaparuṣaivainaM ~MvimimItE̍ yAvAn puruṣa̍ UrddhvabAhustAvA̱n̍ BavatyEtAvadvai puruṣE̍ vIryaM̍ ~MvIryEṇaivainaM̍ ~Mvi mimItE̍ pakṣI Bavati̍ na hyapakṣaḥ̍ patitu-maṛha̍tyaratninA̍# pakṣau drAGIyAṃsau̍ BavatastasmA̱t pakṣapravayAṃsi̍ vayAṃsi̍ vyAmamAtrau pakṣau ca pucCaM̍ ca BavatyEtAvadvai puruṣE̍ vIryaM̍ - [ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam vIryasammita̍ iti# vIrya# - sammitaḥ|vEṇunA|vIti̍|mimItE|AgnEyaḥ|vai|vEṇu̍ḥ|sayOnitvAyEti̍# sayOni - tvAya|yaju̍ṣA|yunakti|yaju̍ṣA|kRuṣati|vyAvRu̍ttyA̍ iti# vi - AvRuttyai|ṣaḍgavEnEti̍# ṣaṭ - gavEna|kRuṣati|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutava̍ḥ|RutuBirityRutu̍ - Biḥ|Eva|Enam|kRuṣati|yat|dvAdaśagavEnEti# dvAdaśa - gavEna|saM~MvathsarEṇEti̍# saM - vathsarEṇa|Eva|iyam|vai|agnEḥ|atidAhAditya̍ti̍ - dAhAt|abiBEt|sA|Etat|dviguṇamiti# dvi - guṇam|apaśyat|kRuṣṭam|ca|akRuṣṭam|ca|tata̍ḥ|vai|imAm|na|atIti̍|adahat|yat|kRuṣṭam|ca|akRu̍ṣṭam|ca|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ~MvIryasaMmitO̍ vEṇunA̍ vi mimIta̍ AgnEyO vai vEṇuḥ̍ sayOnitvAya yajuṣA̍ yunakti yajuṣA̍ kRuṣati vyAvRuttyai̍ ṣaḍgavEna# kRuṣati ṣaḍ vA Rutava# RutuBirEvaina̍M̍ kRuṣati yad dvAdaśagavEna̍# saM~MvathsarEṇaivE yaM ~MvA agnE-ratidAhAda̍biBEth̍ saitad dviguṇama̍paśyat̍ kRuṣṭaM cAkRuṣṭaM̍ ca tatO vA imAM nA&tyadahadyat̍ kRuṣṭaM cAkRuṣṭaM̍ ca - [ ] 26

verses.padam: - Padam Bavati|asyAḥ|ana̍tidAhAyEtyana̍ti̍ - dAhAya|dviguṇamiti# dvi - guṇam|tu|vai|agnim|udyantumityut-yantum|aṛqhati|iti̍|Ahuḥ|yat|kRuṣṭam|ca|akRu̍ṣṭam|ca|Bava̍ti|agnEḥ|udya̍tyA̍ ityut - yatyai|EtAvantaḥ|vai|paśava̍ḥ|dvipAda̍ iti# dvi - pAdaḥ|ca|catu̍ṣpAda̍ iti catuḥ̍ - pAdaḥ|ca|tAn|yat|prAcaḥ|uthsRujEdityu̍t̍ - sRujEt|rudrAya|apIti̍|daddhyAt|yat|dakṣiṇA|pitRuBya̍ iti# pitRu - Byaḥ|nIti|dhuvEt|yat|pratIca̍ḥ|rakṣAṃ̍si|hanyuḥ|udI̍caḥ|uditi̍|sRujati|EṣA|vai|dEvamanuṣyAṇAmiti̍# dEva - manuṣyAṇA̱m|śAntA|dik|27 (50)
verses.samhita: BavatyasyA̍ anatidAhAya̍ dviguṇaM tvA agni-mudyantu-maṛhatItyA̍huryat̍ kRuṣṭaM cAkRuṣṭaM̍ ca BavatyagnErudya̍tyA̍ EtAvantO̍ vai paśavO̱ dvipAdaśca̍ catuṣpAdaśca̍ tAn. yat prAca# uthsRujEd-rudrAyApi# daddhyAd-yad-dakṣiṇA̍ pitRuByO nidhuvEdyat̍ pratIcO rakṣAṃsi̍ hanyurudIca̍ uthsRujatyEṣA̍ vai dEvamanuṣyAṇAṃ̍# śAntA dik - [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam tAm|Eva|EnAn|anu|uditi̍|sRujati|athO̍ iti|Kalu̍|imAm|diśa̱m|uditi̍|sRujati|asau|vai|Adityaḥ|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|prAṇamiti# pra - anam|Eva|EnAn|anu|uditi̍|sRujati|dakṣiṇA|paryAva̍rtanta̍ iti# pari - AvartantE|svam|Eva|vIrya̱m|anviti̍|paryAva̍rtanta̍ iti# pari - AvartantE|tasmA̱t|dakṣi̍ṇaḥ|ad^^rdha̍ḥ|Atmana̍ḥ|vIryA̍vattara̍ iti# vIryAvat̍ - taraḥ|athO iti|Adityasya̍|Eva|AvRutamityA̱̍ - vRuta̱m|anviti|paryAva̍rtanta̍ iti# pari-AvartantE|tasmA̱t|parA̱~jcaḥ|paśava̍ḥ|vIti̍|tiṣṭhantE|pratya~jca̍ḥ|Eti̍|vartantE|tisrasti̍sra̍ iti# tisraḥ - tisraḥ|sItA̱ḥ|28 (50)
verses.samhita: tAmEvainAnanUth sRujatyathO̍ KalvimAM diśamuth sRujatyasau̍ vA Adityaḥ̍ prAṇaḥ prAṇamEvainA-nanUthsRujati̍ dakṣiṇA paryAvartantE̍ svamEva vIryamanu̍# paryAvartantE̍ tasmAd-dakṣiṇO&rddha# AtmanO# vIryAvattarO&thO̍# AdityasyaivA&&*vRutamanu# paryAvartantE̍ tasmAt parA̱~jcaḥ paśavO vi tiṣṭhantE̍ pratya~jca A vartantE̍ tisrastisraḥ̍ sItA̱ḥ - [ ] 28

verses.padam: - Padam kRuṣati|trivRutamiti# tri - vRuta̱m|Eva|yajñamuKa iti# yajña-muKE|vIti|yAtayati|Oṣa̍dhIḥ|vapati|brahma̍ṇA|anna̱m|avEti̍|rundhE|arkE|arkaḥ|cIyatE|caturdaśaBiriti̍# caturdaśa - Biḥ|vapati|sapta|grAmyAḥ|Oṣadhayaḥ|sapta|AraṇyAḥ|uBayI̍ṣAm|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|annasyAnnasyEtyanna̍sya̍ - annasya|vapati|annasyAnnasyEtyanna̍sya-annasya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava-ruddhyai|kRuṣṭE|vapati|kRuṣṭE|hi|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|pratitiṣṭhantIti̍# prati-tiṣṭhanti|anusItamitya̍nu̍ - sItam|vapati|prajA̱tyA iti pra - jAtyai|dvAdaśasviti# dvAdaśa - su|sItAsu|vapati|dvAda̍śa|mAsA̱ḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|saM~MvathsarEṇEti# saM - vathsarEṇa|Eva|asmai|anna̱m|pacati|yat|agniciditya̍gni̍ - cit|29 (50)
verses.samhita: kRuṣati trivRutamEva̍ yajñamuKE̍ vi yAtayatyOṣa̍dhIrvapati̍ brahmaṇA&nnamava# rundhE &rkE̱&rkaścIyatE̍ caturdaśaBirvapati̍ sapta grAmyA Oṣadhayaḥ̍ saptA&&raṇyA uBayIṣAmava̍ruddhyA̍ annasyAnnasya̍ vapatyannasyA-nnasyAva̍ruddhyai̍ kRuṣṭE vapati̍ kRuṣṭE hyOṣadhayaḥ̍ pratitiṣṭhantyanusItaM̍ ~Mvapati̍ prajA̱tyai dvAdaśasu sItAsu̍ vapati dvAdaśa̍ mAsA̱ḥ saM~Mvathsaraḥ saM~MvathsarEṇaivAsmA̍ annaM̍ pacati yadagnici̍ - [ ] 29

verses.padam: - Padam anavaruddhasyEtyana̍va-ruddhasya|aśnIyAt|ava̍ruddhEnEtyava̍# - ruddhEna|vIti|RuddhyEta|yE|vanaspatI̍nAm|Palagraha̍ya̍ iti# Pala-grahayaḥ|tAn|iddhmE|api̍|prEti̍|ukṣEt|ana̍varuddhasyEtyana̍va-ruddhasya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|digBya iti# dik - Byaḥ|lOṣṭAn|samiti|asyati|diśAm|Eva|vIrya̱m|avaruddhyEtya̍va-ruddhya̍|diśAm|vIryE̱|agnim|cinutE|yam|dviṣyAt|yatra̍|saḥ|syAt|tasyai̱|diśaḥ|lOṣṭam|Eti̍|harEt|iṣa̱m|Urja̱m|aham|itaḥ|Eti̍|dadE|iti̍|iṣa̱m|Eva|Urja̱m|tasyai̱|diśaḥ|avEti̍# ( )|rundhE|kṣOdhukaḥ|Bavati|yaḥ|tasyA̱m|diśi|Bava̍ti|uttaravEdimityu̍ttara̍ - vEdim|upEti|vapati|uttaravEdyAmityu̍ttara̍ - vEdyAm|hi|agniḥ|cIyatE̱|athO iti|paśava̍ḥ|vai|uttaravEdirityu̍ttara̍ - vEdiḥ|paśUn|Eva|avEti|rundhE|athO̍ iti|yajñaparuṣa̍ iti# yajña - paruṣaḥ|ana̍ntarityA̍ ityanantaḥ̍ - ityai||30 (75) (ca BavatyEtAvadvai puruṣE̍ vIryaM̍ - ~MyatkRuṣṭa~jcA&kRuṣṭa~jca̍ - diK- sItA# - agnici - dava - pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A5)
verses.samhita: -danavaruddhasyA-śnIyAdava̍-ruddhEna̍ vyRuddhyEta̍ yE vanaspatInAM̍ Palagrahaya-stAniddhmE&pi̍ prOkṣE-danavaruddhasyA-va̍ruddhyai̍ digByO lOṣṭAnth samasyati̍ diśAmEva vIryamavaruddhya̍# diśAM ~MvIryE̱&gniM cinutE̍ yaM dviṣyAd-yatra sa syAt tasyai# diśO lOṣṭamA harEdiṣa-mUrja̍mahamita̍ A dada̍ itIṣamEvOrjaM̍ tasyai# diśO&va# ( ) rundhE kṣOdhukO̍ Bavati yastasyA̱M diśi BavatyuttaravEdimupa̍# vapatyuttaravEdyAṅ hyagniścIyatE̍ &thO# paśavO vA uttaravEdiḥ̍ paśUnEvAva# rundhE&thO# yajñaparuṣO&nantarityai||30̍ (ca BavatyEtAvadvai puruṣE̍ vIryaM̍ - ~MyatkRuṣṭa~jcA&kRuṣṭa~jca̍ - diK- sItA# - agnici - dava - pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam agnE̱|tava|śrava̍ḥ|vaya̍ḥ|iti̍|sika̍tAḥ|nIti̍|vapati|Etat|vai|agnEḥ|vaiśvAnarasya̍|sUktamiti̍# su - uktam|sUktEnEti# su - uktEna|Eva|vaiśvAnaram|avEti̍|rundhE|ṣaḍBiriti̍# ṣaṭ - Biḥ|nIti|vapati|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutava̍ḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|agniḥ|vaiśvAnaraḥ|sAkṣAditi# sa - akṣAt|Eva|vaiśvAnaram|avEti|rundhE|samudram|vai|nAma̍|Etat|Canda̍ḥ|samudram|anviti̍|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|prEti|jAyantE|yat|EtEna̍|sika̍tAḥ|nivapatIti̍# ni - vapati|prajAnAmiti̍# pra - jAnA̱m|prajananAyEti̍# pra - jananAya|indra̍ḥ|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agnE tava śravO vaya iti sikatA̍ ni vapatyEtadvA̍ agnErvai̱śvAnarasya# sUktaṃ sUktEnaiva vai̱śvAnaramava# rundhE ṣaḍBirni vapati̍ ṣaḍvA Rutavaḥ̍ saM~Mvathsaraḥ saM~MvathsarO̱&gnirvai̱śvAnaraḥ̍ sAkṣAdEva vai̱śvAnaramava# rundhE samudraM ~Mvai nAmaitacCandaḥ̍ samudramanu# prajAḥ prajAyantE̍ yadEtEna sikatA̍ ni vapati̍ prajAnAM̱ prajananAyEndrO̍# - [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam vRutrAya|vajra̱m|prEti̍|aharat|saḥ|trEdhA|vIti̍|aBavat|sPyaḥ|tRutI̍yam|ratha̍ḥ|tRutI̍yam|yUpa̍ḥ|tRutI̍yam|yE|antaśśarA̍ ityantaḥ-śarAḥ|aśI̱ryanta|tAḥ|śarka̍rAḥ|aBavann|tat|śarka̍rAṇAm|śarkaratvamiti̍# śarkara - tvam|vajraḥ|vai|śarka̍rAḥ|paśuḥ|agniḥ|yat|śarka̍rABiḥ|agnim|pariminOtIti̍# pari - minOti|vajrE̍ṇa|Eva|asmai|paśUn|parIti̍|gRuhṇAti|tasmA̱t|vajrE̍ṇa|paśava̍ḥ|pari̍gRuhItA̍ iti pari# - gRuhItAḥ|tasmA̱t|sthEyAn|asthE̍yasaḥ|na|upEti̍|haratE|trisaptABiriti̍# tri - saptABiḥ|paśukA̍masyEti̍# paśu - kAmasya|32 (50)
verses.samhita: vRutrAya vajraM prAharath̍ sa trEdhA vyaBavath̍ sPyastRutIyaṃq̍ rathastRutIyaM̍ ~MyUpastRutIyaM̍ ~MyE̱&ntaśśarA aśI̱ryanta tAḥ śarkarA̍ aBavan tacCarkarAṇAṃ̍ śarkaratvaM ~MvajrO vai śarkarAḥ̍ paśuragni-ryacCarkarABiragniM̍ pariminOti̍ vajrEṇaivAsmai̍# paśUn pari# gRuhṇAti tasmAd-vajrEṇa̍ paśavaḥ parigRuhItAstasmAth̍ sthEyAnasthEyasO̍ nOpa# haratE trisaptABiḥ̍ paśukAmasya̍ - [ ] 32

verses.padam: - Padam parIti|minuyAt|sapta|vai|śIrq.ṣaṇyA̱ḥ|prAṇA̍ iti# pra-anAḥ|prAṇA iti# pra - anAḥ|paśavaḥ|prAṇairiti̍# pra - anaiḥ|Eva|asmai|paśUn|avEti|rundhE|triṇavABiriti̍# tri - navABiḥ|BrAtRu̍vyavata̍ iti BrAtRuvya̍ - vataḥ|trivRutamiti# tri - vRuta̱m|Eva|vajra̱m|saBRuMtyEti# saM - BRutya|BrAtRu̍vyAya|prEti̍|harati|stRutyai̱|apa̍rimitABirityapa̍ri̍ - mitABiḥ|parIti|minuyAt|apa̍rimitasyEtyapa̍ri̍ - mitasya|avaruddhyA̍ ityava-ruddhyai|yam|kAmayE̍ta|apaśuḥ|syAt|iti̍|apa̍rimityEtyapa̍ri̍ - mitya|tasya|śarka̍rAḥ|sika̍tAḥ|vIti̍|UhEt|apa̍rigRuhIta̍ ityapari̍ - gRuhItE|Eva|asya|viṣUcIna̱m|rEtaḥ|parEti̍|si~jcati|apaśuḥ|Eva|Bavati|33̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pari# minuyAth sapta vai śIṛṣaṇyA̱ḥ̍ prAṇAḥ prAṇAḥ paśavaḥ̍ prAṇairEvAsmai# paśUnava# rundhE triṇavABi-rBrAtRuvyavata-strivRuta̍mEva̍ vajraṃ# saBRuMtya BrAtRuvyAya̍ praharati̍ stRutyA aparimitABiḥ̍ pari# minuyA-daparimitasyA-va̍ruddhyai̍ yaM kAmayEtApaśuḥ̍ syAdityaparimitya̍ tasya śarkarAḥ̍ sikatA̍ vyUhEdapa̍rigRuhIta̍ EvAsya# viṣUcInaṃq rEtaḥ parA# si~jcatyapaśurEva Bavati̍ - [ ] 33

verses.padam: - Padam yam|kAmayEta|paśumAniti̍# paśu - mAn|syAt|iti|parimityEti̍# pari-mitya|tasya̍|śarka̍rAḥ|sika̍tAḥ|vIti̍|UhEt|pari̍gRuhIta̍ iti pari# - gRuhItE|Eva|asmai|samIcIna̱m|rEtaḥ|si~jcati|paśumAniti̍# paśu-mAn|Eva|Bavati|saumyA|vIti|Uhati|sOma̍ḥ|vai|rEtOdhA̍ iti# rEtaḥ - dhAḥ|rEtaḥ|Eva|tat|dadhAti|gAyatriyA|brAhmaṇasya̍|gAyatraḥ|hi|brAhmaṇaḥ|triṣṭuBA̱|rAjanya̍sya|traiṣṭu̍Baḥ|hi|rAjanya̍ḥ|śaM~Myumiti̍# śaM - yum|bArqḥaspatyam|mEdhaḥ|na|upEti̍|anamat|saḥ|agnim|prEti̍|aviśat|34̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yaM kAmayEta̍ paśumAnth syAditi# parimitya tasya śarkarAḥ̍ sikatA̍ vyUhEt̍ parigRuhIta̍ EvAsmai# samIcInaṃq rEtaḥ̍ si~jcati paśumAnEva Bavati̍ saumyA vyUhati̍ sOmO vai rEtOdhA̍ rEta# Eva tad-dadhAti̍ gAyatriyA brA̱hmaṇasya# gAyatrO hi brA̱hmaṇa-striṣṭuBA# rAjanyasya̍ traiṣṭuBO̍ hi rAjanya̍ḥ̍ śamyuM bAṛhaspatyaM̍ mEdhO nOpAnamath̍ sO̱&gniM prA&viśath̍ - [ ] 34

verses.padam: - Padam saḥ|agnEḥ|kRuṣṇaḥ|rUpam|kRutvA|uditi̍|Ayata|saḥ|aśva̱m|prEti̍|aviśat|saḥ|aśva̍sya|avAntaraśaPa̍ ityavAntara̍ - śaPaḥ|aBavat|yat|aśva̱m|AkramayatItyA̱ - kramayati|yaḥ|Eva|mEdha̍ḥ|aśva̱m|prEti̍|avi̍śat|tam|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|prajApa̍tinEti̍# prajA - patinA|agniḥ|cEtavyaḥ|iti̍|Ahuḥ|prAjApatya̍ iti# prAjA - patyaḥ|aśvaḥ|yat|aśva̱m|AkramayatItyA̱-kramaya̍ti|prajApa̍tinEti̍# prajA - patinA|Eva|agnim|cinutE|puṣkaraparṇamiti# puṣkara - parṇam|upEti|dadhAti|yOni̍ḥ|vai|agnEḥ|puṣkaraparṇamiti̍# puṣkara - parṇam|sayOnimiti̍ sa-yOnim ( )|Eva|agnim|cinutE|apAm|pRuṣṭham|asi|iti|upEti̍|dadhAti|apAm|vai|Etat|pRuṣṭham|yat|puṣkaraparṇamiti̍# puṣkara - parṇam|rUpEṇa|Eva|Enatq|upEti̍|dadhAti||35̍ (70) (indraḥ̍ - paśukAmasya̍ - Bavatya - viśath - sayOniM̍ - ~Mviṃśatiśca)̍ (A6)
verses.samhita: sO̱&gnEḥ kRuṣṇO# rUpaM kRutvOdAyata̍ sO&śvaM prA&viśath̍ sO&śvasyA-vAntaraśaPO̍-Bavad-yadaśva̍mAkramaya̍ti̍ ya Eva mEdhO&śvaM prA&viśat̍ tamEvAva# rundhE prajApatinA&gniścE̍tavya̍# ityAhuḥ̍ prAjApatyO&śvO yadaśvamAkramaya̍ti̍ prajApatinaivA&gniM̍ cinutE̍ puṣkaraparṇamupa# dadhAti yOnirvA agnEḥ puṣkaraparṇaṃ̍ sayOni-̍ ( ) -mEvAgniM cinutE̍ &pAM pRuṣṭhamasItyupa# dadhAtyapAM ~MvA Etat pRuṣṭhaM ~Myat puṣkaraparṇaṃ̍ rUpEṇaivainadupa# dadhAti||35 (indraḥ̍ - paśukAmasya̍ - Bavatya - viśath - sayOniM̍ - ~Mviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam brahma|jajñAnam|iti̍|rukmam|upEti̍|dadhAti|brahma̍muKA̍ iti brahma# - muKAḥ|vai|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|asRujata|brahmamuKA̍ iti brahma# - muKAḥ|Eva|tat|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|yajamAnaḥ|sRujatE|brahma̍|jajñAnam|iti̍|Aha|tasmA̱t|brAhmaṇaḥ|muKya̍ḥ|muKya̍ḥ|Bavati|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|na|pRuthivyAm|na|antari̍kṣE|na|divi|agniḥ|cEtavya̍ḥ|iti̍|yat|pRuthivyAm|cinvIta|pRuthivIm|śucA|arpayEt|na|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|na|vanaspata̍yaḥ|36̍ (50)
verses.samhita: brahma# jajñAnamiti# rukmamupa# dadhAti brahmamuKA̍ vai prajApatiḥ̍ prajA asRujata̍ brahmamuKA̍ Eva tat prajA yajamAnaḥ̍ sRujatE brahma# jajñAnamityAha̍ tasmA̱dbrAhmaṇO muKyO muKyO# Bavati ya EvaM ~MvEda# brahmavAdinO# vadanti na pRuthivyAM̍ nAntarikṣE̍ na divyagniścE̍tavya̍# iti yat pRuthivyAM̍ cinvIta̍ pRuthivIṃ̍ śucA&rpayEnnauṣa̍dhayO̍ na vanaspatayaḥ̍ - [ ] 36

verses.padam: - Padam prEti|jAyErann|yat|antari̍kṣE|cinvIta|antari̍kṣam|śucA|arpayEt|na|vayAṃ̍si|prEti̍|jAyErann|yat|divi|cinvIta|diva̱m|śucA|arpayEt|na|parjanya̍ḥ|varq.ṣEt|rukmam|upEti̍|dadhAti|amRuta̱m|vai|hira̍ṇyam|amRutE̱|Eva|agnim|cinutE|prajA̱tyA̍ iti pra - jAtyai|hiraṇmaya̱m|puruṣam|upEti̍|dadhAti|yajamAnalOkasyEti̍# yajamAna - lOkasya|vidhRu̍tyA̍ iti vi-dhRutyai|yat|iṣṭakAyAḥ|AtRu̍ṇṇamityA-tRuṇṇam|anUpadaddhyAditya̍nu̍ - upadaddhyAt|paśUnAm|ca|yajamAnasya|ca|prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|apIti|daddhyAt|dakṣiṇataḥ|37̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pra jAyErana.̍ yadantarikṣE̍ cinvItAntarikṣaṃ̍ śucA&rpayEnna̍ vayAṃsi̍ pra jAyEranq.̍ yad-divi cinvIta̍ divaṃ# śucA&rpayEnna̍ parjanyO# vaṛṣEdrukmamupa# dadhAtyamRutaM ~Mvai hiraṇyamamRuta̍# EvAgniM cinutE̍ prajA̱tyai hiraṇmayaM puruṣamupa̍# dadhAti yajamAnalOkasya vidhRutyai̍ yadiṣṭakAyA̍ AtRuṇṇamanUpadaddhyAt̍ paśUnAM̍ ca yajamAnasya̍ ca prAṇamapi# daddhyAd dakṣiṇataḥ - [ ] 37

verses.padam: - Padam prA~jca̱m|upEti|dadhAti|dAdhAra̍|yajamAnalOkamiti̍# yajamAna - lOkam|na|paśUnAm|ca|yajamAnasya|ca|prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|apIti|dadhAti|athO̍ iti|Kalu̍|iṣṭa̍kAyAḥ|AtRu̍ṇṇamityA̍ - tRuṇṇam|anu|upEti̍|dadhAti|prAṇAnAmiti̍# pra - anAnA̱m|uthsRuṣṭyA̍ ityut - sRuṣṭyai|draPsaḥ|caskanda|iti|aBIti̍|mRuśati|hOtrA̍su|Eva|Enam|pratIti̍|sthApayati|srucau̱|upEti̍|dadhAti|Ajya̍sya|pUrṇAm|kArṣmaryamayImiti̍# kArṣmarya - mayI̱m|daddhnaḥ|pUrṇAm|audubaMrIm|iyam|vai|kArṣmaryamayIti̍# kArṣmarya - mayI̱|asau|audubaMrI|imE̍ iti|Eva|upEti̍|dhattE|38̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prA~jcamupa# dadhAti dAdhAra# yajamAnalOkaM na paśUnAM̍ ca yajamAnasya̍ ca prAṇamapi# dadhAtyathO KalviṣṭakAyA̍ AtRuṇṇamanUpa̍# dadhAti prAṇAnAmuthsRuṣṭyai̍ draPsaścaskandEtyaBi̍ mRuśati̍ hOtrA̱svEvainaM pratiṣṭhApayati̍ srucAvupa# dadhAtyAjyasya̍ pUrṇAM kA̱rṣmaryamayI̱M daddhnaḥ pUrṇA-maudubaMrImiyaM̍ ~Mvai kA̱rṣmaryamayyasAvau-dubaMrImE̍ EvOpa# dhattE - [ ] 38

verses.padam: - Padam tUṣṇIm|upEti|dadhAti|na|hi|imE̍ iti|yaju̍ṣA|Aptu̱m|aṛha̍ti|dakṣi̍ṇAm|kArṣmaryamayImiti̍# kArṣmarya - mayI̱m|uttarAmityut̍ - tarAm|audubaMrIm|tasmA̱t|asyAḥ|asau|uttarEtyut̍ - tarA|Ajyasya|pUrṇAm|kArṣmaryamayImiti̍# kArṣmarya - mayI̱m|vajraḥ|vai|Ajya̱m|vajra̍ḥ|kArṣmarya̍ḥ|vajrE̍ṇa|Eva|yajñasya̍|dakṣiṇataḥ|rakṣAṃ̍si|apEti̍|hanti|daddhnaḥ|pUrṇAm|audu̍baMrIm|paśava̍ḥ|vai|dadhi̍|Urk|udubaMra̍ḥ|paśuṣu̍|Eva|Urja̱m|dadhAti|pUrṇE̍ iti|upEti̍|dadhAti|pUrṇE̍ iti|Eva|Enam|39̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tUṣṇImupa# dadhAti na hImE yajuṣA&&ptumaṛhati̍ dakṣiṇAM̍ kArṣmaryamayI-muttarAmau-du̍mbarIM̍ tasmAdasyA̍ asAvuttarA &&jyasya̍ pUrṇAM kA̱rṣmaryamayIM ~MvajrO vA AjyaM ~Mvajraḥ̍ kArṣmaryO# vajrEṇaiva̍ yajñasya# dakṣiṇatO rakṣAṅqsyapa# hanti daddhnaḥ pUrṇAmaudumbarIM̍ paśavO vai daddhyUrgudumbara̍ḥ̍ paśuṣvEvOrjaM̍ dadhAti pUrṇE upa# dadhAti pUrṇE Evaina# - [ ] 39

verses.padam: - Padam amuṣminn|lOkE|upEti̍|tiṣṭhEtE̍ iti|virAjIti̍# vi - rAji|agniḥ|cEtavya̍ḥ|iti̍|Ahuḥ|sruk|vai|virAḍiti̍# vi-rAṭ|yat|srucau̱|upadadhAtItyupa̍ - dadhAti|virAjIti̍# vi - rAji|Eva|agnim|cinutE|yajñamuKE̍ yajñamuKa̍ iti# yajñamuKE-yajñamuKE|vai|kriyamAṇE|yajñam|rakṣAṃ̍si|jiGAṃqsanti|yajñamuKamiti̍# yajña - muKam|rukmaḥ|yat|rukmam|vyAGArayatIti# vi - AGArayati|yajñamuKAditi̍# yajña - muKAt|Eva|rakṣAṃsi|apEti̍|hanti|pa~jcaBiriti̍# pa~jca - Biḥ|vyAGArayatIti̍# vi - AGArayati|pA~gkta̍ḥ|yajñaḥ|yAvAn̍|Eva|yajñaḥ|tasmA̱t|rakṣAṃ̍si|apEti̍|hanti|akṣṇayA|vyAGA̍rayatIti̍# vi - AGArayati|tasmA̱t|akṣṇayA̍ ( )|paśavaḥ|a~ggA̍ni|prEti̍|haranti|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai||40 (55)
verses.samhita: mamuṣmin̍ ~MlOka upatiṣṭhEtE̍ virAjyagniścEtavya̍# ityAhuḥ̍ srugvai virAḍyath srucAvupadadhA̍ti̍ virAjyEvAgniM cinutE̍ yajñamuKEyajñamuKE̍ vai kriyamAṇE̍ yajñaṃ rakṣAṃsi̍ jiGAṃsanti yajñamuKaṃ rukmO yad-rukmaM ~MvyAGAraya̍ti̍ yajñamuKAdEva rakṣAṅqsyapa# hanti pa~jcaBivyA GArayati̍ pA~gktO# yajñO yAvAnEva̍ yajñastasmAd-rakṣAṅqsyapa# hantyakṣṇayAvyA GArayati̍ tasmAdakṣṇayA̍ ( ) paśavO&~ggAni̍ pra haranti̍ pratiṣṭhityai||40̍

verses.padam: - Padam svayamAtRuṇṇAmiti# svayaM - AtRuṇṇAm|upEti|dadhAti|iyam|vai|svayamAtRuṇṇEti̍# svayaM-AtRuṇṇA|imAm|Eva|upEti|dhattE|aśva̱m|upEti̍|GrApayati|prAṇamiti̍# pra-anam|Eva|asyAm|dadhAti|athO iti|prAjApatya̍ iti# prajA - patyaḥ|vai|aśvaḥ|prajApa̍tinEti̍# prajA - patinA|Eva|agnim|cinutE|prathamA|iṣṭakA|upadhIyamAnEtyu̍pa-dhIyamA̍nA|paśUnAm|ca|yaja̍mAnasya|ca|prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|apIti|dadhAti|svayamAtRuṇṇEti̍# svayaM - AtRuṇṇA|Bavati|prAṇAnAmiti# pra - anAnA̱m|uthsRuṣṭyA̍ ityut - sRuṣṭyai|athO iti|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ-gasya|lOkasya̍|anu̍KyAtyA̍ ityanu# - KyAtyai|agnau|agniḥ|cEtavyaḥ|iti̍|Ahuḥ|Eṣaḥ|vai|41̍ (50)
verses.samhita: svayamAtRuṇṇAmupa# dadhAtIyaM ~Mvai svayamAtRuṇṇEmAmEvOpa̍# dhattE &śvamupa# GrApayati prAṇamEvAsyA̱M dadhAtyathO̱ prAjApatyO vA aśvaḥ̍ prajApatinaivA&gniM̍ cinutE̍ prathamEṣṭakOpadhIyamA̍nA̍ paśUnAM ca yajamAnasya̍ ca prAṇamapi# dadhAti svayamAtRuṇṇA Bavati̍ prAṇAnAmuthsRuṣṭyA̍ athO# suvargasya# lOkasyAnuKyAtyA̍ agnAvagniścEtavya̍# ityAhurEṣa̍ vA - [ ] 41

verses.padam: - Padam agniḥ|vaiśvAnaraḥ|yat|brAhmaṇaḥ|tasmai̱|prathamAm|iṣṭakAm|yaju̍ṣkRutAmiti̍ yajuḥ̍ - kRutAm|prEti|yacCEt|tAm|brAhmaṇaḥ|ca|upEti̍|daddhyAtAm|agnau|Eva|tat|agnim|cinutE|Iśvaraḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|Arti̱m|ArtOrityA-artOḥ|yaḥ|avi̍dvAn|iṣṭa̍kAm|upadadhAtItyu̍pa̍ - dadhAti|trIn|varAn̍|dadyAt|traya̍ḥ|vai|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|prAṇAnAmiti# pra - anAnA̱m|spRutyai̱|dvau|Eva|dEyau̱|dvau|hi|prAṇAviti# pra - anau|Ekaḥ|Eva|dEya̍ḥ|Eka̍ḥ|hi|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|paśuḥ|42 (50)
verses.samhita: agnirvai̱śvAnarO yadbrA̱hmaṇastasmai̱ prathamAmiṣṭakAM̍ ~MyajuṣkRutAM̍ prayacCEt̍ tAM brA̱hmaṇaścOpa# daddhyAtA-magnAvEva tadagniM cinuta̍ IśvarO vA Eṣa ArtimArtOryO-&vidvAniṣṭa̍kA-mupadadhA̍ti̍ trIn. varA̱n dadyAt trayO vai prAṇAḥ prAṇAnAṅq spRutyai dvAvEva dEyau dvau hi prAṇAvEka# Eva dEya EkO hi prAṇaḥ paśu - [ ] 42

verses.padam: - Padam vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|agniḥ|na|Kalu|vai|paśava̍ḥ|Aya̍vasE|ramantE|dUrvEṣṭakAmiti̍# dUrvA - iṣṭakAm|upEti|dadhAti|paśUnAm|dhRutyai̱|dvAByA̱m|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|kAṇḍA̱tkAṇḍAditi kAṇḍA̱t - kAṇḍAt|prarOhantIti# pra-rOhantI|iti̍|Aha|kAṇḍE̍nakAṇḍEnEti̍ kAṇḍEna̍ - kAṇḍEna|hi|EṣA|pratitiṣṭhatIti# prati - tiṣṭhati|EvA|naḥ|dUrvE|prEti̍|tanu|sahasrE̍ṇa|śatEna̍|ca|iti̍|Aha|sAhasraḥ|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajApatEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|Aptyai̱|dEvalakṣmamiti# dEva-lakṣmam|vai|tryAliKitEti# tri - AliKitA|tAm|uttaralakṣmAṇamityutta̍ra̍ - lakṣmAṇam|dEvAḥ|upEti|adadhata|adha̍ralakṣmAṇamityadha̍ra̍ - lakṣmAṇam|asurAḥ|yam|43̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -rvA Eṣa yadagnirna Kalu vai paśava AyavasE̍ ramantE dUrvEṣṭakAmupa# dadhAti paśUnAM dhRutyai dvAByAM pratiṣṭhityai̍ kAṇḍA̱t kAṇḍAt prarOhantItyAha̍ kAṇḍEnakAṇḍEna̍ hyEṣA̍ pratitiṣṭha̍tyEvA̍ nO# dUrvE pratanu̍ sahasrEṇa̍ śatEna cEtyAha̍ sAhasraḥ prajApatiḥ̍ prajApatErAptyai̍# dEvalakṣmaM ~Mvai tryAliKitA̍ tAmuttaralakṣmAṇaM̍ dEvA upAdadhatA-dha̍ralakṣmAṇa-masu̍rA̍ yaM - [ ] 43

verses.padam: - Padam kAmayEta|vasI̍yAn|syAt|iti̍|utta̍ralakṣmAṇamityutta̍ra-lakṣmAṇam|tasya̍|upEti̍|daddhyAt|vasI̍yAn|Eva|Bavati|yam|kAmayE̍ta|pApI̍yAn|syAt|iti̍|adha̍ralakṣmAṇamityadha̍ra-̍ lakṣmAṇam|tasya|upEti̍|daddhyAt|asurayOnimitya̍sura̍ - yOnim|Eva|Enam|anu|parEti̍|BAvayati|pApI̍yAn|Bavati|tryAliKitEti̍# tri - AliKitA|Bavati|imE|vai|lOkAḥ|tryAliKitEti# tri - AliKitA|EByaḥ|Eva|lOkEByaḥ|BrAtRu̍vyam|antaḥ|Eti|a~ggi̍rasaḥ|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|yataḥ|purOḍAśaḥ|kUrmaḥ|BUtvA|anu̍|prEti̍|asarpat|44̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kAmayEta̍ vasIyAnth̍ syAdityuttaralakṣmAṇaM̍ tasyOpa# daddhyAd-vasIyAnEva̍ Bavati̍ yaM kAmayEta̍ pApIyAnth̍ syAdityadharalakṣmAṇaM̍ tasyOpa# daddhyAdasurayOni-mEvainamanu parA# BAvayati pApIyAn̍ Bavati tryAliKitA BavatImE̍ vai lOkAstryAliKitaiBya̍ Eva lOkEByO BrAtRuvyamantarEtya~ggi̍rasaḥ̍ suvargaM ~MlOkaM ~Myataḥ purOḍAśa̍ḥ̍ kUrmO BUtvA&nu prAsarpa̍ - [ ] 44

verses.padam: - Padam yat|kUrmam|upadadhAtItyupa̍ - dadhAti|yathA̱|kṣEtraviditi̍# kṣEtra - vit|a~jjasA|naya̍ti|Evam|Eva|Enam|kUrmaḥ|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|a~jjasA|nayati|mEdha̍ḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|paśUnAm|yat|kUrmaḥ|yat|kUrmam|upadadhAtItyu̍pa̍ - dadhAti|svam|Eva|mEdha̱m|paśya̍ntaḥ|paśava̍ḥ|upEti̍|tiṣṭhantE|śmaśAnam|vai|Etat|kriyatE|yat|mRutAnA̱m|paśUnAm|śIrq.ṣAṇi̍|upadhIyanta̍ ityupa̍ - dhIyantE̱|yat|jIvantam|kUrmam|upadadhAtItyu̍pa̍ - dadhAti|tEna̍|aśma̍śAnacidityaśma̍śAna̍ - cit|vAstavyaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|45̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -dyat kUrmamupadadhA̍ti̍ yathA̱ kṣEtravida~jjasA̍ nayatyEvamEvaina̍M̍ kUrmaḥ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkama~jjasA̍ nayati mEdhO vA Eṣa paśUnAM̍ ~Myat kUrmO yat kUrmamupa̍ dadhAti̍ svamEva mEdhaM paśyantaḥ̍ paśava upa# tiṣṭhantE śmaśAnaM ~MvA Etat kriyatE̍ yanmRutAnA̱M paśUnAṃ śIrq.ṣAṇyupadhIyantE̍ yajjIvantaM̍ kUrmamupa̍ dadhAti̍ tEnAśmaśAnacidvAstavyO̍# vA Eṣa yat - [ ] 45

verses.padam: - Padam kUrmaḥ|madhu|vAtA̱ḥ|RutAyata̍ ityRuta̍ - yatE|iti|daddhnA|madhumiśrEṇEti̍# madhu - miśrEṇa|aBIti̍|anakti|svadaya̍ti|Eva|Enam|grAmyam|vai|Etat|anna̱m|yat|dadhi̍|Araṇyam|madhu̍|yat|daddhnA|madhumiśrEṇEti̍# madhu - miśrEṇa|aByanaktItya̍Bi̍ - anakti|uBaya̍sya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava-ruddhyai|mahI|dyauḥ|pRuthivI|ca|naḥ|iti̍|Aha|AByAm|Eva|Enam|uBayata̍ḥ|parIti̍|gRuhṇAti|prA~jca̱m|upEti̍|dadhAti|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|sama̍ṣṭyA̍ iti saM-aṣṭyai|purastA̱t|pratya~jca̱m|upEti|dadhAti|tasmA̱t|46̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kUrmO madhu vAtA# RutAyata iti# daddhnA madhumiśrEṇABya̍nakti̍ svadayatyEvaina̍M̍ grAmyaM ~MvA EtadannaM ~Myad-daddhyAraṇyaM̍ madhu yaddaddhnA madhumiśrEṇA̱̍ ByanaktyuBayasyA &varuddhyai̍ mahI dyauḥ pRuthivI̍ ca# na ityAhA̍ &&ByAmEvainamuBayataḥ̍ parigRuhṇAti̍ prA~jcamupa# dadhAti suvargasya# lOkasya samaṣṭyai̍ purastA̱t pratya~jcamupa# dadhAti tasmA̱t - [ ] 46

verses.padam: - Padam purastA̱t|pratya~jcaḥ|paśava̍ḥ|mEdha̱m|upEti̍|tiṣṭhantE|yaḥ|vai|apa̍nABimityapa̍# - nABim|agnim|cinutE|yajamAnasya|nABi̱m|anu̍|prEti̍|viśati|saḥ|Enam|Iśvaraḥ|hiṃsi̍tOḥ|ulUKa̍lam|upEti̍|dadhAti|EṣA|vai|agnEḥ|nABi̍ḥ|sanA̍Bimiti̍ sa - nABim|Eva|agnim|cinuta|ahiṃsAyai|audu̍baMram|Bavati|Urk|vai|udubaMra̍ḥ|Urja̱m|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|maddhyataḥ|upEti̍|dadhAti|maddhyataḥ|Eva|asmai|Urja̱m|dadhAti|tasmA̱t̍ ( )|maddhyataḥ|UrjA|Bu~jjatE|iyat|Bavati|prajApa̍tinEti̍# prajA - patinA|yajñamuKEnEti# yajña - muKEna|sammi̍tamiti̍ saM - mitam|avEti|hanti|anna̱m|Eva|akaḥ|vaiṣṇavyA|RucA|upEti̍|dadhAti|viṣṇu̍ḥ|vai|yajñaḥ|vaiṣṇavAḥ|vanaspata̍yaḥ|yajñE|Eva|yajñam|pratIti̍|sthApayati||47̍ (77) (Eṣa vai - paśu - rya - masarpa̍ - dEṣa yat - tasmAt - tasmA̱th - saptaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A8)
verses.samhita: purastA̱t pratya~jcaḥ̍ paśavO mEdhamupa# tiṣṭhantE yO vA apanABimagniM̍ cinutE̍ yajamAnasya̍ nABimanu praviśati̍ sa EnamIśvarO̍ hiṃsitOrulUKa̍lamupa̍# dadhAtyEṣA vA agnErnABiḥ sanABimEvA&gniM̍ cinutE̍ hiṃsAyA̍ audumbaraM̍ BavatyUrgvA udumbara̍ UrjamEvAva̍# rundhE maddhyata upa# dadhAti maddhyata EvAsmA UrjaM̍ dadhAti tasmA̱n-( )-maddhyata UrjA Bu~jjata̍ iyad-Bavati̍ prajApatinA̍ yajñamuKEna saMmitamava̍# hantyannamEvAka̍-rvaiṣṇavyarcOpa̍# dadhAti viṣṇurvai yajñO vai̱ṣṇavA vanaspatayO̍ yajña Eva yajñaM pratiṣṭhApayati||47̍ (Eṣa vai - paśu - rya - masarpa̍ - dEṣa yat - tasmAt - tasmA̱th - saptaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam EṣAm|vai|Etat|lOkAnA̱m|jyOtiḥ|saMBRu̍tamiti̍ saM-BRutam|yat|uKA|yat|uKAm|upadadhAtItyupa-dadhA̍ti|EByaḥ|Eva|lOkEBya̍ḥ|jyOti̍ḥ|avEti̍|rundhE|maddhyataḥ|upEti̍|dadhAti|maddhyataḥ|Eva|asmai|jyOti̍ḥ|dadhAti|tasmA̱t|maddhyataḥ|jyOti̍ḥ|upEti̍|AsmahE|sika̍tABiḥ|pUrayati|Etat|vai|agnEḥ|vaiśvAnarasya̍|rUpam|rUpEṇa̍|Eva|vaiśvAnaram|avEti̍|rundhE|yam|kAmayE̍ta|kṣOdhu̍kaḥ|syAt|iti̍|UnAm|tasya̍|upEti̍|48̍ (50)
verses.samhita: EṣAM ~MvA EtallOkAnAM jyOtiḥ samBRutaM̍ ~MyaduKA yaduKA-mupadadhA̱tyEBya̍ Eva lOkEByO jyOtirava# rundhE maddhyata upa# dadhAti maddhyata EvAsmai jyOtirdadhAti̍ tasmA̱nmaddhyatO jyOtirupA̱&&smahE sikatABiḥ̍ pUrayatyEtadvA agnErvai̱śvAnarasya# rUpaṃ rUpEṇaiva vai̱śvAnaramava# rundhE yaM kAmayEta̍ kṣOdhukaḥ̍ syAdityUnAM tasyOpa# - [ ] 48

verses.padam: - Padam daddhyAt|kṣOdhukaḥ|Eva|Bavati|yam|kAmayE̍ta|anu̍padasyadityanu̍pa̍ - dasyat|anna̱m|adyAt|iti|pUrṇAm|tasya̍|upEti̍|daddhyAt|anu̍padasyadityanu̍pa̍ - dasyat|Eva|anna̱m|atti|sahasra̱m|vai|pratIti|puru̍ṣaḥ|paśUnAm|yacCati|sahasra̱m|anyE|paśava̍ḥ|maddhyE̱|puruṣaśIrq.ṣamiti̍# puruṣa - śIrq.ṣam|upEti|dadhAti|savIryatvAyEti̍# savIrya-tvAya|uKAyA̱m|apIti̍|dadhAti|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati - sthAm|Eva|Enat|gamayati|vyRuddhamiti̍ vi - Ruddham|vai|Etat|prAṇairiti# pra - anaiḥ|amEddhyam|yat|puruṣaśIrq.ṣamiti# puruṣa - śIrq.ṣam|amRuta̱m|Kalu|vai|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|49 (50)
verses.samhita: daddhyAt kṣOdhuka̍ Eva Bavati̍ yaM kAmayEtA-nupadasya-danna̍madyAditi̍# pUrṇAM tasyOpa# daddhyAdanupadasya-dEvAnna̍matti̍ sahasraM ~Mvai prati puruṣaḥ̍ paśUnAM ~MyacCati̍ sahasramanyE̍ paśavO maddhyE# puruṣaśIrq.ṣamupa# dadhAti savIryatvAyO-KAyAmapi# dadhAti pratiṣṭhAmEvainad-gamayati̍ vyRuddhaM̍ ~MvA Etat prAṇairamEddhyaM̍ ~Myat puruṣaśIṛṣamamRutaM̍ Kalu vai prAṇA - [ ] 49

verses.padam: - Padam amRuta̱m|hiraṇyam|prAṇEṣviti̍# pra - anEṣu|hiraṇyaśalkAniti̍# hiraṇya - śalkAn|pratIti|asyati|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati-sthAm|Eva|Enat|gamayitvA|prAṇairiti# pra-anaiḥ|samiti|ad^^rdhayati|daddhnA|madhumiśrEṇEti̍# madhu-miśrEṇa|pUrayati|madhavya̍ḥ|asAni|iti̍|śRutAta~gkyE̍nEti̍# śRuta - Ata~gkyEna|mEddhyatvAyEti̍# mEddhya - tvAya|grAmyam|vai|Etat|anna̱m|yat|dadhi̍|Araṇyam|madhu̍|yat|daddhnA|madhumiśrEṇEti̍# madhu - miśrEṇa|pUraya̍ti|uBaya̍sya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|paśuśIrq.ṣAṇIti# paśu - śIrq.ṣAṇi|upEti̍|dadhAti|paśava̍ḥ|vai|paśuśIrq.ṣAṇIti̍# paśu - śIrq.ṣAṇi|paśUn|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|yam|kAmayE̍ta|apaśuḥ|syAt|iti̍|50̍ (50)
verses.samhita: amRutaṃq hiraṇyaM̍ prAṇEṣu# hiraṇyaśalkAn pratyasyati̍ pratiṣṭhAmEvainad-gamayitvA̍ prAṇaiḥ samarddhayati̍ daddhnA madhumiśrEṇa̍# pUrayati madhavyO&sAnIti̍# śRutAta~gkyEna̍ mEddhyatvAya# grAmyaM ~MvA EtadannaM ~Myad-daddhyAraṇyaM̍ madhu yaddaddhnA madhumiśrEṇa̍# pUrayatyuBayasyA-va̍ruddhyai̍ paśuśIrq.ṣAṇyupa# dadhAti paśavO vai paśuśIrq.ṣAṇi̍# paśUnEvAva# rundhE yaM kAmayEtApaśuḥ̍ syAditi# - [ ] 50

verses.padam: - Padam viṣUcInAni|tasya̍|upEti̍|daddhyAt|viṣU̍caḥ|Eva|asmAt|paśUn|dadhAti|apaśuḥ|Eva|Bavati|yam|kAmayE̍ta|paśumAniti̍# paśu - mAn|syAt|iti|samIcInA̍ni|tasya̍|upEti̍|daddhyAt|samIca̍ḥ|Eva|asmai|paśUn|dadhAti|paśumAniti̍# paśu - mAn|Eva|Bavati|purastA̱t|pratIcIna̱m|aśvasya|upEti̍|dadhAti|paścAt|prAcIna̱m|RuṣaBasya̍|apa̍śavaḥ|vai|anyE|gO̍ aśvEBya iti# gO -aśvEByaḥ|paśava̍ḥ|gO̍ aśvAniti# gO - aśvAn|Eva|asmai|samIcaḥ|dadhAti|EtAva̍ntaḥ|vai|paśava̍ḥ|51̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dvipAdaśca̍ catuṣpAdaśca̍ tAn. vA Etadagnau pradadhAti̍ yat paśuśIrq.ṣAṇyu̍pa-dadhA̱tya-mumA̍raṇyamanu̍# tE diśAmItyAha̍ grAmyEBya# Eva paśuBya# AraṇyAn paśU~jCucamanUthsRujati̍ tasmA̱th samAvat̍ paśUnAM prajAyamAnAnA-mAraṇyAḥ̍ paśavaḥ kanIyAṃsaḥ̍ śucA hyRutAḥ̍ sarpaśIrq.ṣamupa̍# dadhAti yaiva sarpE tviṣistAmEvAva# rundhE - [ ] 52

verses.padam: - Padam dvipAda iti# dvi - pAdaḥ|ca|catu̍ṣpAda̍ iti catuḥ̍ - pAdaḥ|ca|tAn|vai|Etat|agnau|prEti|dadhAti|yat|paśuśIrq.ṣAṇIti̍# paśu - śIrq.ṣAṇi|upadadhAtItyu̍pa̍ - dadhAti|amum|Araṇyam|anviti̍|tE|diśAmi|iti̍|Aha|grAmyEBya̍ḥ|Eva|paśuBya̍ iti# paśu - Byaḥ|AraṇyAn|paśUn|śuca̱m|anU|uditi̍|sRujati|tasmA̱t|samAva̍t|paśUnAm|prajAya̍mAnAnAmiti̍# pra - jAyamAnAnAm|AraṇyAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|kanI̍yAṃsaḥ|śucA|hi|RutAḥ|sarpaśIrq.ṣamiti̍# sarpa - śIrq.ṣam|upEti|dadhAti|yA|Eva|sarpE|tviṣi̍ḥ|tAm|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|52̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yath samIcIna̍M̍ paśuśIrq.ṣairupa̍ daddhyAd grAmyAn paśUn daṃśukAḥ̍ syuryad-viṣUcIna̍-mAraṇyAn.̍ yajurEva̍ vadEdava̍ tAM tviṣiṃ# rundhE yA sarpE na grAmyAn paśUn. hinasti nA&&*raṇyAnathO KalUpadhEya̍mEva̍ yadupadadhA̍ti̍ tEna tAM tviṣimava# rundhE yA sarpE yad-yajurvadati̍ tEna# śAntaM||53 (UnAntasyOpa# - prAṇAḥ - syAditi - vai paśavO# - rundhE - catuścatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam yat|samIcIna̱m|paśuśIrq.ṣairiti# paśu - śIrq.ṣaiḥ|upadaddhyAdityupa̍ - daddhyAt|grAmyAn|paśUn|daṃśukAḥ|syuḥ|yat|viṣUcIna̱m|AraṇyAn|yaju̍ḥ|Eva|vadEt|avEti̍|tAm|tviṣi̱m|rundhE|yA|sarpE|na|grAmyAn|paśUn|hinasti̍|na|AraṇyAn|athO̍ iti|Kalu̍|upadhEyamityu̍pa̍ - dhEya̱m|Eva|yat|upadadhAtItyupa̍ - dadhAti|tEna̍|tAm|tviṣi̱m|avEti̍|rundhE|yA|sarpE|yat|yaju̍ḥ|vada̍ti|tEna̍|śAntam||53̍ (44) (UnAntasyOpa# - prAṇAḥ - syAditi - vai paśavO# - rundhE - catuścatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A9)

- Padam paśuḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|agniḥ|yOniḥ|Kalu̍|vai|EṣA|paśOḥ|vIti̍|kriyatE|yat|prAcIna̱m|aiṣṭakAt|yaju̍ḥ|kriyatE̱|rEta̍ḥ|apasyA̱ḥ|apasyA̱ḥ|upEti̍|dadhAti|yOnau̱|Eva|rEta̍ḥ|dadhAti|pa~jca̍|upEti̍|dadhAti|pA~gktA̱ḥ|paśava̍ḥ|paśUn|Eva|asmai|prEti̍|janayati|pa~jca̍|dakṣiṇataḥ|vajra̍ḥ|vai|apasyA̱ḥ|vajrE̍ṇa|Eva|yajñasya̍|dakṣiṇataḥ|rakṣAṃ̍si|apEti̍|hanti|pa~jca̍|paścAt|54̍ (50)
verses.samhita: paśurvA Eṣa yadagniryOniḥ Kalu vA EṣA paśOrvi kriyatE̍ yat prAcInamaiṣṭakAd-yaju̍ḥ̍ kriyatE rEtO&pasyA̍# apasyA# upa# dadhAti yOnAvEva̍ rEtO# dadhAti pa~jcOpa# dadhAti pA~gktA̱ḥ paśavaḥ̍ paśUnEvAsmai prajanayati̍ pa~jca# dakṣiṇatO vajrO vA apasyA̍# vajrEṇaiva̍ yajñasya# dakṣiṇatO rakṣAṅqsyapa# hanti pa~jca# paścAt - [ ] 54

verses.padam: - Padam prAcI̱ḥ|upEti|dadhAti|paścAt|vai|prAcIna̱m|rEta̍ḥ|dhIyatE|paścAt|Eva|asmai|prAcIna̱m|rEta̍ḥ|dadhAti|pa~jca̍|purastA̱t|pratIcI̱ḥ|upEti̍|dadhAti|pa~jca̍|paścAt|prAcI̱ḥ|tasmA̱t|prAcIna̱m|rEta̍ḥ|dhIyatE|pratIcI̱ḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra-jAḥ|jAyantE|pa~jca|uttarata̍ ityut̍ - tarataḥ|CandasyA̱ḥ|paśavaḥ|vai|CandasyA̱ḥ|paśUn|Eva|prajA̍tAniti̍ pra - jAtAn|svam|AyatanamityA̱̍ - yatanam|aBi|parIti̍|UhatE|iyam|vai|agnEḥ|atidAhAditya̍ti̍ - dAhAt|abiBEt|sA|EtAḥ|55 (50)
verses.samhita: prAcIrupa# dadhAti paścAdvai prAcInaṃq rEtO# dhIyatE paścAdEvAsmai̱ prAcInaṃq rEtO# dadhAti pa~jca# purastA̱t pratIcIrupa# dadhAti pa~jca# paścAt prAcIstasmA̱t prAcInaṃq rEtO# dhIyatE pratIcI̱ḥ prajA jAyantE̍ pa~jcO̱ttarata śCandasyA̱ḥ̍ paśavO vai CandasyA̱ḥ̍ paśUnEva prajAtAnth̍ svamAyatanamaBi̍ paryUhata̍ iyaM ~MvA agnE-ratidAhAda̍biBEth̍ saitA - [ ] 55

verses.padam: - Padam apasyA̱ḥ|apaśyat|tAḥ|upEti|adhatta|tata̍ḥ|vai|imAm|na|atIti̍|adahat|yat|apasyA̱ḥ|upadadhAtItyu̍pa̍ - dadhAti|asyAḥ|ana̍tidAhAyEtyana̍ti̍ - dAhAya|uvAca|ha|iyam|ada̍t|it|saḥ|brahma̍ṇA|anna̱m|yasya̍|EtAḥ|upadhIyAntA̍ ityupa̍ - dhIyAntai̱|yaḥ|u|ca|EnAḥ|Evam|vEdat|iti̍|prAṇaBRuta̍ iti# prAṇa-BRutaḥ|upEti̍|dadhAti|rEta̍si|Eva|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|dadhAti|tasmA̱t|vadann|prAṇanniti̍# pra - anann|paśyann|śRuṇvann|paśuḥ|jAyatE|ayam|puraḥ|56̍ (50)
verses.samhita: apasyA̍# apaśyat tA upAdhatta̍ tatO vA imAM nAtyadahad-yada̍pasyA̍# upadadhA̱tyasyA anatidAhAyOvAca̍# hEyamadadith sa brahmaṇA&nnaM ~MyasyaitA upadhIyAntai̍ ya u# cainA EvaM~MvE daditi# prAṇaBRuta upa# dadhAti rEtasyEva̍ prAṇAn dadhAti̍ tasmAd-vadan̍ prAṇan paśya~jCRuṇvan̍ paśurjAyatE̍ &yaM purO - [ ] 56

verses.padam: - Padam Buvaḥ|iti̍|purastA̱t|upEti̍|dadhAti|prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|Eva|EtABiḥ|dAdhAra|ayam|dakṣiṇA|viśvakarmEti̍# viśva-karmA|iti|dakṣiṇataḥ|mana̍ḥ|Eva|EtABi̍ḥ|dAdhAra|ayam|paścAt|viśvavya̍cA̍ iti# viśva - vyacAḥ|iti|paścAt|cakṣu̍ḥ|Eva|EtABi̍ḥ|dAdhAra|idam|uttarAdityu̍t̍ - tarAt|suvaḥ|iti̍|uttarata̍ ityut̍ - tarataḥ|śrOtra̱m|Eva|EtABiḥ|dAdhAra|iyam|upari̍|matiḥ|iti̍|upari̍ṣṭAt|vAca̱m|Eva|EtABi̍ḥ|dAdhAra|daśa̍daśEti̍ daśa-daśa|upEti̍|dadhAti|savIryatvAyEti̍# savIrya-tvAya|akṣṇayA|57̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Buva iti# purastAdupa# dadhAti prAṇamEvaitABi-rdAdhArA&yaM̍ dakṣiṇA̍ viśvakarmEti# dakṣiṇatO mana# EvaitABirdAdhArAyaM̍ paścAd-viśvavyacA̍ iti# paścA-ccakṣurEvaitABi̍-rdAdhArEda-mu̍ttarAth̍ suvarityuttarataḥ̍ śrOtramEvaitABi̍-rdAdhArEyamupari̍# matirityupariṣṭAd-vAca̍mEvaitABi̍-̍ rdAdhAra daśadaśOpa̍# dadhAti savIryatvAyA̱kṣṇayO - [ ] 57

verses.padam: - Padam upEti|dadhAti|tasmA̱t|akṣṇayA|paśava̍ḥ|a~ggA̍ni|prEti̍|haranti|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|yAḥ|prAcI̱ḥ|tABiḥ|vasi̍ṣṭhaḥ|Ad^^rdhnOt|yAḥ|dakṣiṇA|tABi̍ḥ|BaradvA̍jaḥ|yAḥ|pratIcI̱ḥ|tABi̍ḥ|viśvAmi̍tra̍ iti# viśva - mitraḥ|yAḥ|udIcIḥ|tABi̍ḥ|jamada̍gniḥ|yAḥ|Ud^^rdhvAḥ|tABi̍ḥ|viśvakarmEti̍# viśva - karmA|yaḥ|Evam|EtAsA̱m|Ruddhi̱m|vEda|RuddhnOti̍|Eva|yaḥ|AsAm|Evam|bandhutA̱m|vEda̍|bandhu̍mAniti̍ bandhu# - mAn|Bavati|yaḥ|AsAm|Evam|klRupti̱m|vEda|kalpa̍tE|58̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -pa# dadhAti tasmAdakṣṇayA̍ paśavO&~ggAni̍ praharanti̍ pratiṣṭhityai̍ yAḥ prAcIstABi-rvasiṣṭha̍ ArddhnOdyA dakṣiṇA̍ tABirBaradvA̍jO̍ yAḥ pratIcIstABi# rviśvAmitrO̍ yA udIcIstABi̍-rjamada̍gniryA̍ UrddhvAstABi-rviśvaka̍rmA̍ ya EvamEtAsAmRuddhiM ~MvEdarddhnOtyEva ya AsAmEvaM̍ bandhutAM ~MvEda bandhumAn̍ Bavati ya AsAmEvaM̍ klRuptiM ~MvEda kalpatE̍ - [ ] 58

verses.padam: - Padam asmai|yaḥ|AsAm|Evam|AyatanamityA̱̍ - yatanam|vEda̍|Ayata̍navAnityAyata̍na̍ - vAn|Bavati|yaḥ|AsAm|Evam|pratiṣṭhAmiti# prati - sthAm|vEda|pratIti̍|Eva|tiṣṭhati|prAṇaBRuta̍ iti# prAṇa - BRutaḥ|upadhAyEtyu̍pa̍ - dhAya|saM~Myata̍ iti# saM - yataḥ|upEti̍|dadhAti|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|Eva|asminn|dhitvA|saM~MyadBiriti# saM~Myat - Biḥ|samiti|yacCati|tat|saM~MyatAmiti̍# saM - yatA̱m|saM~Myattvamiti# saM~Myat - tvam|athO iti|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anE|Eva|apAnamityapa̍ - anam|dadhAti|tasmA̱t|prAṇApAnAviti# prAṇa - apAnau|samiti|carataḥ|viṣU̍cIḥ|upEti̍|dadhAti|tasmA̱t|viṣva̍~jcau|prAṇApAnAviti̍# prAṇa-apAnau|yat|vai|agnEḥ|asaM~MyatamityasaM̱̍ - yatam|59 (50)
verses.samhita: &smai ya AsAmEvamAyata̍naM̍ ~MvEdA&&*yatanavAn̍ Bavati ya AsAmEvaM̍ pratiṣṭhAM̍ ~MvEda pratyEva tiṣṭhati̍ prAṇaBRuta# upadhAya# saM~Myata upa# dadhAti prAṇAnEvA &smin̍ dhitvA saM~MyadBiḥ saM~MyacCati̍ tath saM~MyatAṃ# saM~MyattvamathO̱ prAṇa EvApAnaM dadhAti̍ tasmA̱t prAṇApAnau saM caratO̍ viṣUcIrupa̍# dadhAti tasmAd-viṣva~jcau̍ prAṇApAnau yadvA agnErasaM~Myata̍ - [ ] 59

verses.padam: - Padam asuvargyamityasu̍vaḥ̍ - gyam|asya|tat|suvargya# iti# suvaḥ - gyaḥ|agniḥ|yat|saM~Myata̍ iti# saM - yataḥ|upadadhAtItyu̍pa̍ - dadhAti|samiti̍|Eva|Enam|yacCati|suvargya̍miti̍# suvaḥ - gya̱m|Eva|akaḥ|tryaviriti# tri - aviḥ|vaya̍ḥ|kRutam|ayA̍nAm|iti̍|Aha|vayO̍Biriti̍ vayaḥ̍ - Biḥ|Eva|ayAn|avEti̍|rundhE|ayai̱ḥ|vayAṃ̍si|sarvata̍ḥ|vAyumatIriti̍# vAyu - matI̱ḥ|Bavanti|tasmA̱t|ayam|sarvataḥ|pavatE||60̍ (35) (paścA - dEtAḥ - purO̱ - &kṣṇayA - kalpatE - &saM̍ ~MyataM - pa~jcatriṃśacca)̍ (A10)
verses.samhita: -masuvargyamasya̍ tath suvargyO̱&gniryath̍ saM~Myata# upa dadhAti̍ samEvainaM̍ ~MyacCati uvargyamEvAka̍ -stryavirvayaḥ̍ kRutamayAnAmityA̍ha̍ vayOBirEvAyAnava̍# rundhE &yairvayAṃsi̍ sarvatO# vAyumatI̱rBavanti tasmAdayaṃ̍ sarvataḥ̍ pavatE||60 (paścA - dEtAḥ - purO̱ - &kṣṇayA - kalpatE - &saM̍ ~MyataM - pa~jcatriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam gAyatrI|triṣṭup|jagatI|anuṣṭugitya̍nu-stuk|pa~gktyA̱|saha||bRuhatI|uṣṇihA̱|kakut|sUcIBi̍ḥ|śimyantu|tvA||dvipadEti̍# dvi - padA̱|yA|catuṣpadEti̍ catuḥ̍ - padA|tripadEti# tri - padA̱|yA|ca|ṣaṭpadEti ṣaṭ - padA||saCandA̍ iti sa - CandAḥ|yA|ca|vicCandA̍ iti vi - CandAḥ|sUcIBiḥ|śimyantu|tvA||mahAnA̱mnIriti̍# mahA - nAmnIḥ|rEvatayaḥ|viśvA̱ḥ|AśA̱ḥ|prasUva̍rIriti̍# pra - sUvarIḥ||mEG^^yA̱ḥ|vidyuta̍ iti# vi - dyutaḥ|vAca̍ḥ|sUcIBi̍ḥ|śimyantu|tvA||rajatAḥ|hari̍ṇIḥ|sIsA̱ḥ|yuja̍ḥ|yujyantE|karma̍Biriti̍ karma# - Biḥ||aśvasya|vAjina̍ḥ|tvaci|sUcIBi̍ḥ|śimyantu|tvA||nArI̱ḥ|61̍ (50)
verses.samhita: gAyatrI triṣṭub jagatyanuṣṭuk̍ pa~gktyA# saha|bRuhatyuṣṇihA̍# kakuth sUcIBiḥ̍ śimyantu tvA||dvipadA yA catuṣpadA̍ tripadA yAca ṣaṭpadA|saCa̍ndA̍ yA ca vicCandAḥ̍ sUcIBiḥ̍ śimyantu tvA||mahAnA̱mnI rEvatayO̍ viśvA AśA̱ḥ prasUvarIḥ|mEGyA̍# vidyutO vAcaḥ̍ sUcIBiḥ̍ śimyantu tvA||rajatA hariṇIḥ̍ sIsA yujO# yujyantE karmaBiḥ|aśva̍sya̍ vAjinastvaci̍ sUcIBiḥ̍ śimyantu tvA||nArI̱ - [ ] 61

verses.padam: - Padam tE|patnayaḥ|lOma̍|vIti̍|cinvantu|manIṣayA̱||dEvAnA̱m|patnI̱ḥ|diśa̍ḥ|sUcIBi̍ḥ|śimyantu|tvA||kuvit|a~gga|yava̍manta̍ iti yava# - mantaḥ|yava̱m|cit|yathA̱|dAnti|anupUrvamitya̍nu̍ - pUrvam|viyUyEti# vi - yUya||ihEhEtIha̍ - iha|EṣAm|kRuṇuta|BOjanAni|yE|barqḥiṣa̍ḥ|namO̍vRuktimiti̍ namaḥ̍ - vRuktim|na|jagmuḥ||62 (30) (nArI̱ - striṃqśacca)̍ (A11)
verses.samhita: -stE patnayO̍ lOma vicinvantu̍ manIṣayA̱|dEvAnAM patnIrdiśaḥ̍ sUcIBiḥ̍ śimyantu tvA||kuvida~gga yavamantO̍ yavaM̍ cidyathA dAntyanupUrvaM̍ ~MviyUya|ihEhai̍ṣAM̍ kRuṇuta BOjanAni̍ yE barqḥiṣO namOvRuktiM̍ najagmuḥ||62 (nArI̱ - striṃqśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam kaḥ|tvA|Cyati|kaḥ|tvA|vIti|śAsti|kaḥ|tE|gAtrA̍ṇi|śimyati||kaḥ|u|tE|śamitA|kaviḥ||Rutava̍ḥ|tE|RutudhEtyRu̍tu̍ - dhA|paruḥ|śamitAra̍ḥ|vIti̍|śAsatu||saM~MvathsarasyEti̍# saM - vathsarasya|dhAya̍sA|śimI̍Biḥ|śimyantu|tvA||daivyA̱ḥ|addhvaryava̍ḥ|tvA|Cyantu̍|vIti̍|ca|śAsatu||gAtrA̍ṇi|parvaśa̍ iti# parva - śaḥ|tE|śimA̱ḥ|kRuṇvantu|śimyantaḥ||ad^^rdhamAsA̍ ityad^^rdha̍ - mAsAḥ|parUṃṣi|tE|mAsA̱ḥ|Cyantu|śimya̍ntaḥ||ahOrAtrAṇItya̍haḥ̍ - rAtrAṇi|maruta̍ḥ|vili̍ṣṭamiti̍ vi - liṣṭam|63 (50)
verses.samhita: kastvA̱ cCyati kastvA vi śA̱sti kastE gAtrAṇi̍ śimyati|ka u# tE śamitA kaviḥ||Rutavasta̍ RutudhA paruḥ̍ śamitArO viśAsatu|saM~Mvathsarasya̍ dhAyasA̍ śimIBiḥ̍ śimyantu tvA||daivyA# addhvaryavastvA̍ cCyantu vi ca# śAsatu|gAtrAṇi̍ parvaśastE śimA̱ḥ kRuṇvantu śimyantaḥ||arddhamAsAḥ̍ parUṃṣi̍ tE mAsA̱ḥ Cyantu śimyantaḥ|ahOrAtrAṇi̍# marutO viliṣṭaṃ̍ - [ ] 63

verses.padam: - Padam sUdayantu|tE||pRuthivI|tE|antarikṣEṇa|vAyuḥ|Cidram|Biṣajyatu||dyauḥ|tE|nakṣa̍traiḥ|saha|rUpam|kRuṇOtu|sAdhuyA||śam|tE|parE̱Byaḥ|gAtrE̱Byaḥ|śam|astu|ava̍rEByaḥ||śam|asthaBya̍ ityastha - Byaḥ|majjaBya iti# majja - Byaḥ|śam|u|tE|tanuvE̱|Buvat||64 (30) (viliṣṭaM̍ - triṃqśacca)̍ (A12) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 12 Anuvaakams :- (viṣṇumuKA̍ - annapatE̍ - yAvatI̍ - vi vai - puruṣamAtrEṇA̍ - &gnE tava śravO vayO - brahma# jajñAnaṅ - svayamAtRuṇṇA̍ - mEṣAM ~Mvai - paśu - rgAyatrI̍ - kastvA - dvAdaśa̍ ) Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (viṣṇumuKA̍ - apacitimAnq̍ - vi vA EtA - vagnE tava# - svayamAtRuṇṇAM - ~MviṣUcInA̍ni̍ - gAyatrI - catuṣṣaṣṭiḥ)̍ First and Last Padam of śecond Prasnam of 5th Kandam (viṣṇumuKA̍ - stanuvE# Buvat )||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE pa~jcamakAṇḍE dvitIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||
verses.samhita: sUdayantu tE||pRuthivI tE &ntarikṣEṇa̍ vAyuśCidraM Biṣajyatu|dyaustE̍ nakṣatraiḥ̍ saha rUpaM kRuṇOtu̍ sAdhuyA||śaM tE parE̱ByO gAtrE̱Byaḥ śamastvavarEByaḥ|śamasthaByO̍# majjaByaḥ śamu# tE tanuvE# Buvat||64 (viliṣṭaM̍ - triṃqśacca)̍ (A12) praśna kOrvai with starting padams of 1 to 12 anuvAkams :- (viṣṇumuKA̍ - annapatE̍ - yAvatI̍ - vi vai - puruṣamAtrEṇA̍ - &gnE tava śravO vayO - brahma# jajñAnaṅ - svayamAtRuṇṇA̍ - mEṣAM ~Mvai - paśu - rgAyatrI̍ - kastvA - dvAdaśa̍ ) kOrvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (viṣṇumuKA̍ - apacitimAnq̍ - vi vA EtA - vagnE tava# - svayamAtRuṇṇAM - ~MviṣUcInA̍ni̍ - gAyatrI - catuṣṣaṣṭiḥ)̍ first and last padam of second praśnam of 5th kAṇḍam (viṣṇumuKA̍ - stanuvE# Buvat )||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pa~jcamakAṇḍE dvitIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||------------------------------------ OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ hariḥ OM 5.3 pa~jcamakAṇḍE tRutIyaḥ praśnaḥ - citInAM nirUpaṇaM
